This figure was

The two of you continue to watch TV and your brother still takes no notice of what is within that diaper of yours. You of course have gotten used to sitting in a dirty diaper as you no longer tell someone when you have gone. They just check on you regularly.

111121.content:
You are currently at school messing your diaper, ironically in a bathroom. It was a pretty normal process for you, having always worn diapers. As soon as you finished, your close friend Brian came in. "Peew" he said fanning his nose." smells like you need a change... Need me to do it" he questioned jokingly. "Yup" you anwsered back cheekily. You looked around at the changing satation, the school was once a nursery that took care of older toddlers, and when they would have accidents they would be changed here.

You Briefly wondered if your friend would actually change you.
Does he?
111121.title: School

1111211.content:
"Well alright then go, lie down on the table" he said without missing a beat. You did so a little reluctantly knowing your friend was going to see your privates. He grabbed the diapers and supplies from your pack and went to work. He first untaped the poopy diaper, then he gently wiped you down, then he liberally spread powder over your diaper area, and finally snugly taped the clean diaper on. You went to put your jeans back on but your hands were slapped away by him saying" I changed you, I might as well dress you". You rolled your eyes but let him pull your jeans up and redo your belt. This happened everytime he changed you, which was fairly often, he always insisted on dresssing you." Thanks" you said after he finished. You could change yourself if you needed to, but your friend could do it better and you didn't like changing yourself.

What next?
1111211.title: Yes,

11112111.content:
As you were leaving school, your Brian took you by the hand and lead you to his mom's car, and you both got in the back. You sat in your 5 point harnest car seat and buckled yourself in. Brian was still in a booster. The main reason you still stayed in a car sest is because, when you were little your mom died in a car crash. Your dad was devestated, and he'd be even more so if he lost you or your brother.

That's why he insisted, you stay in a car seat. You didn't mind though, you got your own arm rests, a cup holder, and besides it was pretty comfy. Heck your brother, who was almost 13, still rode in a booster seat!

They arrived just a few minutes later. You unbuckled yourself from your carseat then got out, Brian doing the same. You grinned happily, you jogged past the front gates, showing your season pass lazily. Brian came behind you, taking the diaper bag off your shoulder and shrugging it on his.

"Tell you what, stop pouting, and I'll buy you a soda!" He offered in apology thinking he had actually hurt your feelings by saying that. "Ok deal. I wish I knew earlier that I just had to make a sour face to get you to buy me stuff." You teased, lightly punching him in the arm.

"Little brat, you tricked me!" He yelled in mock anger. "C'mere diaper boy, time for a spanking!" He exclaimed reaching out to grab you. You giggled pushing him away. "Diaper boy? That's the best you can do? At least try to be original." You fired back.

"Shut up, just get on the changing table." He sputtered out. You smirked but obeyed and lied on the table. "Don't get so cocky, I'm the one who changes your diapers. If I wanted, I could use itching powder instead of baby powder." He warned, taking your jeans off.

"Sure, sure." You dismissed as he untaped your pampers diaper. You lifted your legs letting him wipe your butt and privates. He tossed the wet diaper, then slid a clean one under you, shook some baby powder onto you, beofre he taped it on.

He brought out a blue onesie with Cookie Monster on it and a pair of blue shorts. Part of you wanted complain about the Sesame Street onesie, but you've always had a soft spot for the Cookie Monster. You hopped off the table and followed Brian out of the bathroom.

Suddenly, he turned around and shoved a green pacifier in your mouth. "Aww, you look so cute!" He commented, patting you on the head. You glare at his giggling form as he ran way. Pretty much ever since he found you wore diapers, he almost always treated you like a little kid.

He'd do things like: change your diapers, dress you, and even occasionally make you drink from a bottle or pacifier. To be honest, you didn't hate that treatment. You actually kinda liked it a little bit! However, making you suck a pacifier, especially in public was a little too far.

You don't even know where he could've gotten the pacifier from! Though, you did like the feeling you got when you sucked on it. It was pretty soothing after all, but it was also pretty darn embarrassing having to suck one in public!

You ran after Brian, hoping to catch up with him. On your way, what did you decide to do with the pacifier?
1111211121.title: "Dress you into something else."

You kept the pacifier in your mouth as you chased after Brian. It was embarassing but the soothing feeling you got made it worth it. You'd never admit in front of Brian though! He'd never ever let you live it down!

It's super embarrassing to be ten years old and in diapers. You fix your jeans and try desperately to get your shirt to hide your diaper bulge.

You grumble under your breath, you unfortunately knew what the RB is. It's a robotic babysitter. It is free of charge, plus it came with free room and board, plus contience is also not a requirement. That's perfect for your family. "Come on sweet heart, you look great!" Your mom encourages, trying to get your confidence up.

"You should smile more, Tom. Dad would've wanted it." Your brother, Jack, explains trying to cheer you up. "It's easy for you to say, you're not wearing diapers!" You snap, with no real heat to your words though. "Hey, I'm wearing pull-ups. They're not much better." The twelve year old reasons putting his hands up in surrender. The accident clearly didn't affect him as badly as it did you, both physically and mentally.

"Come on boys, we'll be late." Your mother insisted, trying to keep herself together. "Okay Mom." You reply heading out to the car. The car ride to the old and large mansion, was silent and quick. "Bye boys, be good." Your mom said waving goodbye. You and Jack are lead to different rooms. Are we gong to continue with this story line?

choices: Insist that you don't need to wear diapers
1111321.content:
Your name was Tom Layor(Close friends called you Tommy though); you thought you were a pretty average 10-year-old kid. You had some good friends, got into trouble sometimes, got pretty good grades. All in all, you didn't seem that special.

Sure, you lived in a foster home but so did plenty of other kids. It's not like they were mean or abusive or anything. You also wore pull ups to bed, again though, that was fairly common. You were about to find out that you were completely wrong about you being average.

You were sitting in math class, barely paying attention when the loud-speaker came on. "Thomas Layor, please report to the office with your backpack." It called out, and a few kids looked at you in surprise. "See ya' around." You said, tired and bored from your math lesson.

You walked to the office, slinging your back-pack over your shoulder. In the lobby three tall, muscular men, all clad in black suits, were standing there looking intimidating. "Are you Thomas Layor?" The one in the middle asked politely. "Yeah, who're you?" You answered reluctantly.

Quickly, he got on one knee and bowed his head. "My name is of no importance, however it is an honor and a privilege to be in your presence your highness." He uttered, reverently. "My men and I were sent on behalf of your grandmother, Elizabeth Queen of Ozymandia, to collect you and bring you to your true home." He explained solemnly.

"Please follow me, milord." He requested, standing up. "S-sure." You agreed, just being in pure shock and not knowing what else to do. "I'd like it better if you called me Tommy instead of 'milord'." You stated, being uncomfortable with anyone being so formal towards you.

"If that is what you wish mil-Tommy." The man agreed hesitantly, walking out of the building. You followed him, noticing a large limousine in the parking lot. "Tommy, did you require assistance with your diaper?" He asked, almost so casually that you almost missed it.

"Um, I don't wear diapers, I actually haven't for like 8 years. I mean, yeah, I wear pull ups at night but those don't count." You explained, looking at the man confused. "Forgive me, it briefly slipped my mind that you were not raised in the royal traditions. In your family, all the males wear diapers." He explained himself.

"You are probably wearing regular underwear currently. Luckily, Her Highness reminded me about this fact, so I could be prepared for this. I have brought a package of diapers from Ozymandia that you can now wear." He mused, mostly to himself, before looking back at you.

What do you do?
1111321.title: Continue with this story

11113212.content:
"Um, okay." You agreed, to shocked to argue. "Splendid." He replied, opening the back seat of the limo. It was roomy enough, for you and all three of the men to fit comfortably. At your feet was an unopened package of diapers.

"Tommy if you so desire, I'll give you privacy so you can diaper yourself." He decided, handing you a diaper with baby animal prints all over it, along with some baby powder. "I don't know how to put on a diaper." You answered, uncomfortably. "I will assist you then." He offered politely.

"Please, remove your pants and underwear." He requested professionally. You nodded, slowly taking your jeans off. With even more hesitation, you removed your boxer-briefs, leaving you exposed. The man unfolded the diaper and slid it under your rear. He powdered you and made sure to rub it in, then he taped the diaper on.

You sat up, immediately noticing how thick it was. It spread your legs apart a little and really just made you look like an oversized toddler. You knew your pants wouldn't fit over it. "We'll be driving to the harbor, then go half way to Ozymandia by boat. The rest of the way via helicopter." He explained, as if it were completely normal for 10 year old to wear a diaper

"Okay." You said, not sure what else you could say. The limo ride was uneventful but awkwardly silent. You all eventually reached the harbor. Waiting for you was an amazing yacht! The men escorted you on to the ship. "Tommy, you're quarters are over here." The man from earlier, brought you inside the massive ship.

In the first room you entered, there was a huge king sized bed, with dark blue covers, with cream colored pillows. On top of the bed there was your old stuffed frog, that you thought the you had lost years ago. It seemed the exact same as the day you lost it.

You quickly ran to the bed and grabbed it, happily hugging it. The man simply looked on with a smile. "Where did you find him?" You asked almost in tears from joy. Your frog had been your constant companion for years when you were being bounced between foster homes.

You had cried for days when you had lost him. The man ruffled your hair, "I have my ways." He shrugged, not wanting to tell you how hard he worked to find your old stuffed animal. "Thank you!" You exclaimed, giving the man a bear hug. He looked shocked at the gesture, but he returned it moments later. "You're very welcome." He smiled gently.

You hugged your frog close to your chest, promising yourself that you would never lose him again. After that you eventually decided to...
11113212.title: Agree to wear a diaper

111132122.content:

You nodded in agreement, you were pretty exhausted from the day's events. Plus, you were already diapered, so you didn't have to worry about getting the bed soaked.

You climbed into the bed, still clutching your frog tightly. You rested your head on the pillow and then the man gently tucked you in. He left the room and turned off the lights, you were alseep just a few moments later.

You were woken up, by the man lightly shaking your shoulder. "It's almost time, the helicopter will arrive soon." He informed, as you groggily sat up, rubbing your eyes. You couldn't tell, but you're diaper was probably soaked. "Do you require a new diaper?" He asked, giving you room to get up.

You shrugged in response, standing up. The front of your diaper was discolored and the animals had changed colors too, indicating that you had actually wet it. "It seems that you do." He observed then, remembering that you didn't know how to change yourself, he untaped your diaper.

Quickly he wiped your diaper area, managed to powder you, then taped a new diaper on. He did this all while you were standing up. You barely had time to think before you were ushered in to the helicopter and buckled in.

"...Meet your grandmother?" He asked, holding the doors open for you. You nodded nervously and walked in and jumped when the doors slammed behind you. Nervously, you walked up to the large elegant throne. Sitting upon it, was an old woman in a fancy dress, with ornate gloves on her hands, and a golden crown laying on her snow white hair.

"H-hello, grandmother. It's a pleasure to see you." You greet shyly, bowing your head. You clutched your frog tightly, hoping he'd give you more courage. She frowned sternly as she looked at you. "How dare you! No grandson of mine will refer to me so formally. That's granny to you, not grandmother!" She exclaimed, in mock offense. You were petrified when she began, but you slowly relaxed as she finished. "Sorry granny." You apologized with a smile.

"Much better. Now come here, let your granny take a look at you." She ordered, smiling in that way only a grandma could. You obeyed, walking over to the throne. She stood up and examined you, before pulling you into a big hug. "You've grown so much since I last saw you, Tommy! You were just a baby then!" She gushed, finally releasing you from the hug. "Super Frog!" You answered, grinning. "That's a wonderful name. Tell me have you had lunch yet?" She inquired, and you shook your head 'no'. "Great, I was just about to have lunch. You will join me." She insisted, having the energy of a much younger woman. "Um granny, can I get dressed first?" You interrupted, still in just a shirt and diaper. "Oh of course, I'll show you to your room." She agreed, easily. You followed her through a door to the left of the throne, leading you to a long hallway.

She opened the first door on the right and entered a room. It had a king sized bed, with air plane themed sheets and train themed blankets. The shirt also was different from what you expected, it was longer than a normal one and with snaps at the end of it.

After , you brought the snaps together, then you realized it really was just an oversized version of a baby's onesie! You frowned then but said nothing, not wanting to annoy your grandma. You pulled your new shorts on and buttoned them. Then...
1111321221.title: Meet your grandmother

Still, you'd much rather wear your regular underwear over a diaper, especially knowing the fact you would have to use it pretty soon. However, all of this made you glad you never made fun of Michael. He was a kid who was in your 3rd grade class. He was the kid that wore diapers full time.

You didn't have a bully bone in your body, so you never tried to make fun him about it. Besides, you still occasionally had daytime accidents back then. It was a shame that he moved to another town; he was actually a pretty funny kid. You were broken out of your thoughts when you heard your granny calling your name. "What's up?" You asked, not hearing her question. "I asked, what did you want for lunch. You can have anything you like." She clarified.

"Also for next time, say 'pardon me' instead of 'what's up'. It's more polite, I don't care if you're less formal with me, but it's important to be formal during special occasions." She corrected gently. You blushed and nodded, a little embarrassed about your lack of manners.

"Can I have chicken fingers and fries, please?" You requested, after thinking about what you wanted. She nodded and called over a butler. She told him your order and her own, and he nodded, then briskly walked back to the kitchen.

About 5 minutes later, the butler came back out with your meals. He put yours in front of you, along with a glass of milk. Afterwards, he handed the queen her lunch, a bowl of salad. You didn't notice how hungry you actually were until you started eating! You finished your plate quickly and patted your belly happily after!

Quickly it became too much, you grabbed your stomach hoping maybe you'd stop it, but you soon felt a warm mass enter the back of your diaper.

You blushed beat red; you had just messed yourself! You hadn't done that since you were four! "Did you have an accident, Tommy?" She asked, trying to hide her amusement about your embarrassment. She didn't quite understand why you were so embarrassed over something, she felt was, so trivial.

You didn't know how to respond to that question. On one hand, you didn't want to lie to your granny. You had a feeling that you'd regret it, but on the other hand, you really, really, didn't want to admit you had just pooped your diaper! You were torn, but after a few seconds, you had finally made your choice. You told her that...

11123.content:
HOW MY "DIAPER DESIRES" STARTED (SOMETIME IN LATE 1985)

I was well past the age of four when I was potty trained. Now 14, I don't have many memories of my childhood, but, I do remember toilet training like it was yesterday. The thing I remember the most about it is that it was something I didn't want to do. I was expected to use the toilet at my age, but I was satisfied with wearing diapers. I had absolutely no intentions whatsoever of giving them up. I had always thought and hoped that diapers would be a part of my entire life, at least for a good part of my childhood.

I showed no signs of being ready for potty training, and I was four, nearly five years old! Like most parents, mine were trying hard to get me through this so-called rite of passage from babyhood to childhood. I made it very difficult for my parents. They tried everything to get me out of diapers, but I was too much of a challenge for them.

I was about three and a half when my parents, mainly my mother, initiated the toilet-training process, after waiting too long for my "signs of readiness" to develop, which they never did. At three years old I messed my diapers just like I must have the day I was born and all the days in between. Nothing about my methods of going to the bathroom had changed one bit in over a year of my parent's hoping I'd be "ready." I was never ready to start, so my mom had to push me along.

She started out with a gentle approach, being lenient about my accidents. As I continued to show no signs of progress, she conceded her efforts out of frustration and let me just go in diapers again. A couple weeks would pass, long enough for her patience to be restored, and then she'd try it again, using more drastic measures each time. She tried the reward system at first, using positive reinforcement. After awhile this turned to a more negative approach. The reward
system failed miserably as I kept making a mess of every single diaper that was put on me. "Forget the cookies or ice cream for using the toilet!" I thought. At
that age, I knew that if I ever proved myself able to use the toilet, then the diapers would be off-- forever! I did not want that! Even with foregoing getting
a sweet confection of some sort for achieving a goal for my parents, I wanted to wear my diapers! My brothers also wanted me to stay in diapers; they got to eat
all of "my" cookies before they went stale!

The award system was abolished, and the spanking system was implemented in
its place. No more cookies, if I didn't produce a bowel movement in the toilet
and used my diaper instead, then it was time for a good swat on the butt. My
mother was quite easy on the spankings, but my dad's spankings were a lot more
painful and he administered more strikes of his hand to my buttocks.

I was finally forced into being potty trained by outright intimidation and
humiliation. I remember times when my mom would scold me in the middle of the
grocery store or wherever we happened to be. Out loud she would say, "Chris! Did
you just poop in your diaper?!" in the checkout line and then spank me right
there! The entire world knew that I had an accident and that I was getting beat
across the behind for it! Most of the other parents, and most of the other
children, some even younger than I was, knew that I was a little too old to be
wearing diapers. My parents finally figured it out that I was wanting to use the
diapers. They knew that I liked them. Everything from the thick, bulky feel to
the warmth of the wetness and the squishiness of the poop made it too good to
give up. I also liked how they looked on me.

My parents, however, didn't agree with a having a boy who was approaching
kindergarten still wearing diapers. They finally resorted to taking my diapers
away, whether I was ready to go without them or not! My diapers! Gone! They made
me go around the house completely naked! For an entire week I was forced to go
naked around the house, even right in front of my two older brothers! At night I
was allowed to go to bed wearing only my underwear. Without diapers or anything
else on me, I either had to go in the toilet or go on the floor, and if I went
on the floor, I would be in BIG trouble!

Being the kid I was, I challenged my parents and deliberately left a big
pile on the kitchen floor one evening before we ate dinner. I was given a
spanking that I'll never, ever forget. In fact, I was spanked so bad that I
couldn't sit on the toilet because of my red, swollen buttocks. My parents
essentially defeated the purpose of their mission by spanking me so hard then.
After that incident it was down to serious business. At this point my parents
were so frustrated and desperate as ever. Mom made me spend my entire afternoon
in the bathroom for a week wearing nothing. It came down to this: use the toilet
or get another severe whacking on the butt and another week in the bathroom
naked. It was force, but enough force to make me use the toilet. There was no
praise, no congratulations, no cookies, nothing to commemorate the moment. I do
recall my mom and dad getting a babysitter to watch us while they went out that
evening, and that they came home unusually late. My brother tells me that they
went out and celebrated for themselves. I believe it, being that I made toilet
training pure hell for them!
11123.title: Diaper Desires

111231.content:
DIAPER DESIRES: PART 2
----------------------

Once I had my parents convinced that I was toilet trained, they made very
sure that I was using the toilet and only the toilet. The diapers were gone now
and I had absolutely nothing to wet or mess in except my underwear, which, as I
learned, was not adequate for such use. Most parents expect their children to
have a few accidents after toilet training. Mine, on the other hand, were
completely intolerant towards accidents. I had a few accidents, more
than a few. I enjoyed having them, until I got scolded. To mom and dad, an "F"
on my report card or a cavity at the dentist was tolerated more than an accident
in my pants. I really began to resent the way they were so strict about my
accidents. This just gave me one more reason to go against them and have my
accidents whenever I felt like it, and I always felt like it.
If I had it my way, I would have continued to wear diapers. The way my
parents wanted it was to get me out of diapers like all the other kids. "There's
a reason they don't make diapers for big kids like you," my mom always told me
after having an accident. I later learned that such diapers do exist, but my
parents didn't want me to know that at the time. They figured I'd probably want
to wear them again. How right they were!

My parents were not only very intolerant of my accidents, but they always
went into how my brothers never had accidents when they were my age. While many
of my accidents were on purpose, for the fun of it, some of them were accidents
in the true sense of the word. When I was in the first grade I had an accident
after getting off the bus because there was a wreck (not with the bus, luckily)
on the way home and it delayed traffic by another 30 minutes. I really had to go
and had counted on getting home and going to the bathroom at that time (I wasn't
going to mess my pants on the bus with other kids!). Things were just untimely
that day and I had an accident in my pants. This still wasn't good enough of an
excuse for my mom and dad. They scolded me and compared me to my brothers and
made the usual federal case out of it.

It was so lame to use the toilet. To me, nothing sounded so appealing as
having mom put a nice thick diaper on me. I lamented that those days were long
gone. According to my mom, diapers were made only for babies and I'd never have
the chance to wear them again since I was no longer a baby. In spite of that
misinformation I couldn't help myself, even if it made mom and dad upset at me.
I just had to mess my underpants, it was such a joy to do it. Still, I was
spanked, I was grounded, and I had my privileges revoked. At age six I was again
sentenced to a week of nakedness in the bathroom. Even though I hated such
punishment, nothing would stop me from being the baby boy I wanted to be!

The risk of severe punishment was just too great, but at the same time,
the pleasure I got from messing my pants was something I could not live without.
When I was eight, I figured out that my parents didn't have to know about my
"accidents". I also discovered that I could make a "diaper" of my own. I looked
at pair of my underpants one day and then it occurred to me that if I wore
several of them together then it could function as a diaper. I could only do
this after I went to bed, or face severe punishment. In my bedroom my parents
would have no idea what I was up to. I would try to avoid using the toilet all
day so that I would need to go more at night.

Every night after I went to bed I'd I put on about six to eight more pairs
of underwear. As I lay there, I'd wait until I needed to go to the bathroom.
When I did, I didn't get up and walk into the bathroom. Instead I stayed in my
bed and I'd just wet my underwear, also poop in it too when I needed to. It was
a mess, a wonderful mess! I felt so naughty!

I had to hide the evidence afterwards, lest I be caught the next morning
when my mom came in to wake me up for school. I would take the dirtied-up
underwear and hide it on the floor in my closet. I had several old blankets
folded up in the closet, which I used to cover up the soiled underwear.
Afterwards I would then put on more clean pairs of underwear and repeat the
whole process if I could before the night was over. I kept this up for a few nights. I tried to be careful not to leave any other signs of my actions, but one time I became careless and was nearly caught.
One morning my brother Dean observed that I had a different pair of underwear.
"Why do you have different underwear on this morning?" she asked me.
"What do you mean?" I replied.
"Last night you had on underwear with a red stripe, now you've got a blue
stripe."
Oops! Think fast! Lie!
"I was wearing these when I went to bed last night!"
"You were not!"
"I was too!"
"You were not! You had on..."
Mom intervened. "Kids, don't argue! Just eat your cereal!"

Whew! That argument ended right there. My brothers and I argued so much in
the morning that mom never paid any attention to what we were arguing about.
She'd just tell us to "shut up and eat our cereal." Had she been paying
attention, it may have clued my mom in on what I was doing in my bed.

I kept messing my underwear every night for several more nights, but, it
was only a matter of time before my mom discovered my little secret. Her first
clue was that my laundry basket didn't have as much underwear in it as it
usually did. The more obvious clue was discovered immediately afterwards. I
figured this little game of mine wouldn't last forever, or even for much longer,
for that matter.
111231.title: Continued

1112311.content:
FRIDAY, NOVEMBER 3, 1989

The day was Friday, November 3, 1989, a red-letter day that I will forever
remember. I came home from school on that cold day along with my two brothers as
we had always done. We came through the door, set down our book bags and
promptly turned on the TV to watch the after-school cartoons.
A few minutes later I heard my mom call me from the laundry room.
"Chris! Come here!" she hollered.
I knew I was in trouble, judging from the tone of her voice. I felt my
heart racing in anxiety. I knew she had found out what I had been doing in my
bed every night. I sat there, trying to delay my punishment as much as I could.
"Chris! I said come here, now!"
"What did you do?" asked my oldest brother Dean.
"I don't know." What a lie! I knew exactly what I did!
"You're in trouble, Chris!" commented Sam, my other brother.
"You'd better go see mom, she sounds mad," advised Dean.
"CHRIS! In fact, ALL OF YOU, COME HERE! RIGHT NOW!!"
Now the boys were wondering why they were suddenly brought into this. We
all got up and walked into the laundry room. Our mother was standing before the
washing machine. To her side was a laundry basket that contained my dirty
underwear. She held up one of the many badly soiled pairs of underwear that I
had hidden. The entire seat of it was plastered with brown, dried poop. "Oh,
no!" I thought.
"Chris,," she began. "I found these in your closet! I was wondering where
all your underwear was going!"
"How did you find them?" I asked.
"Because I could SMELL them! Your room STINKS!" My brothers started
giggling.
"I was having overnight accidents, mom!"
"Accidents? Ha! You've been doing this on purpose! I found at least a
dozen pairs just like this! Your story is full of holes, Chris!"
"Yeah, and it's full of shit, too!" commented Dean.
"Dean!" mom reprimanded. I don't want to ever hear that language from you
again!
"Sorry, mom, but it's TRUE!"
"Mom, why do Dean and Sam have to know about this?" I asked, feeling
really embarrassed.
"So they'd get to see what their brother does in his bed! It allows them
to see what kind of behavior he is exhibiting! It's so you'd be embarrassed! I
think that's a good start for your punishment!"
"What? Am I gonna get spanked?" I asked fearfully.
"Well, spanking won't do any good after I'm finished with you!" she
answered. "You will, however, be punished in a VERY BIG way for this!"
What? A MONTH in the bathroom?!!! Was dad going to give me the spanking of
my life? What was I in for now??? I was really scared! I started crying.
"Mom! I'm sorry!" I sobbed. "Really, I'm sorry, and I won't do it again!"
"Well, Chris, you've been doing this a lot, and I KNOW you'll do it again,
so I hardly think for even a second that you won't do it again, because you
will! Ever since we finally got you toilet trained you've been doing this! Your
father and I told you a million times that we didn't want any accidents! We've
tried everything Chris! We've even grounded you to the bathroom! I'm at the end
of my rope! WHAT IS IT WITH YOU?!!!"
"I dunno!" I replied with guilt. Mom continued with her little tirade.
"I thought that maybe you were grown up and ready to be a big boy, but, I
guess you're not, and you never will be! It seems to me that this is what you
want to do, am I right?"
1112311.title: Mother discovers soiled underwear

11123111.content:
I couldn't lie. I said "y-y-yes."
"That's what I thought! Your dad and I decided that you can't use the
toilet like we'd expect you to, so starting now, you will no longer use it!
Instead, you will be wearing diapers!
"D-d-diapers?" I asked.
"Yes, Chris. I just got some for you today!"
Diapers? Diapers?! DIAPERS! It couldn't be! Yes! It's true! They finally
got the message: I want to wear diapers!!! Now, I was finally getting my wish! I
got my diapers back! I got my diapers back! Hooray! Hooray!
"Follow me to your room!" she commanded. "Dean, Sam, I want you to see
this, too!"
The four of us all went into my room. My mom opened up my underwear drawer
and showed me that my underwear had been replaced with diapers! I couldn't
believe it! There were diapers stuffed into my drawers! REAL DIAPERS! Just like
babies wear, only larger! All this time I was told that they didn't make diapers
for older kids, but now I knew that such diapers were available, and I was going
to be wearing them! As excited as I was, I didn't want to show my delight over
the diapers. I was being punished, and if I showed that I enjoyed it, it
wouldn't be punishment and my parents would probably make me do something I may
not enjoy. This "punishment" was certainly better than sitting in the bathroom
all day long. Now it looked like I'd probably never be in there again except to
brush my teeth and to take baths.

Mom pulled one of the diapers out of the drawer. As she held it in front
of me I looked at it and admired its visually appealing characteristics. It was
big, white, and very thick, proportionally much thicker than any diaper I'd ever
seen a baby wear. The front and the rear of the diaper had extra padding for
more absorbency and the legs had elastic bands around them to control leaks. To
top if off, it had Velcro closures on it to ensure a nice, tight, and secure
fit. I couldn't wait any longer! I wanted to put it on!
"You obviously want to wear them!" she commented as if to sense that I
would enjoy wearing them. "You might think wearing these diapers is great,
Chris, but you'll need to get used to a few other things, too, since you've
chosen this behavior!"
I didn't know what she was talking about. All I knew so far was that I was
getting put back into diapers, and that sounded fine with me!
I looked around my room and noticed some other things. On the floor near
my bed was a large pad. Next to the pad was a plastic bucket. On top of my
dresser (now my diaper drawers) was baby powder, lotion, wipes, and some old
wash rags. I figured out that this was where my diaper changes would take place.
"I brought your brothers in here so I could show them how to change you!"
said mom. "Now, I want you two to watch and pay attention so you'll know how to
do this!"
"What?!" Dean exclaimed. "We have to change his diapers, too?"
"Of course, Dean!" my mom reasoned. "I can't be changing them all the
time, you know."
Wait a minute! My BROTHERS were going to be changing my diapers? That
thought didn't settle with me so well. Getting to wear diapers sounded great,
but I didn't want my brothers involved in changing them! They weren't too wild
about the idea, either.
"You're not kidding, are you mom?" asked Sam. "We have to actually wipe
his butt clean and diaper him?"
"Yes! I doubled each of your allowances for doing this! Think about it,
boys, it might actually be fun to diaper up your little brother!"
"Okay, we'll do it!" they said in unison, agreeing to change my diapers.

So my brothers were recruited to change my diapers. I didn't like this idea, but I figured I'd get used to it eventually and it wouldn't bother me so much. As long as I got to wear diapers, I was happy.
"Take your pants and your underwear off right now!" ordered my mom.
"In front of Dean and Sam?" I protested.
"Chris, they're going to see you naked every day!" mom reasoned, "so
there's no reason to be modest. Now take them off already!"

I unfastened my pants and dropped them to the floor. Standing there with
only my underwear on, I removed it, exposing my bare butt to Dean and Sam.
"Now lie down on the pad!" said my mom. Naked except for a shirt, I was lying
there waiting to be diapered!
"Lift your butt up!" commanded my mom as she slid the thick diaper beneath
me. As I sat back down, I could feel the diaper's bulkiness beneath me. What a
wonderful feeling! As my mom pulled the front of the diaper over me, I felt like
I was in a sudden time warp, as if I had been instantly returned to babyhood. It
was so wonderful to be wearing diapers again! With my diaper securely pulled up
on me, she fastened the velcro closures. At long last I was wearing a diaper!

I sat up, looking down at my crotch. The diaper bulged out so far and
filled up a lot of space between my legs. Just the sight of diapers on me looked
so good, I couldn't wait to use them! As I sat there examining myself
and the diaper, my mom and my brothers stood and watched.
"Now get up and walk around. It'll take you awhile to get used to, but
you'll have plenty of time for that, and I do mean plenty!"

I got up and stood for a moment. I tried to put my legs closer together,
but the diaper was far too big and bulky to allow me to do that. I walked around
my room and felt the heavy, bulky diaper on my backside as I walked.
"I got you the thickest diapers I could get, Chris!" said mom. "Knowing
your messes, and that you'll probably need to go several hours between changes,
I thought it'd be a good idea for you to wear the extra-thick ones." And extra
thick they were!

I looked in the mirror on my bedroom door. I wanted to see how I looked
from the rear. My butt was so heavily and thickly padded! I ran my hand along
the seat of my diaper to feel how thick it was back there. I couldn't get over
the way it looked and felt; it was so thick and so soft. I continued to stand before the mirror, admiring the way the diapers had such a dominance over me. They were always there, and so big and bulging. I
turned to various angles, enjoying views of my butt, my side, my front, my
crotch; it looked good from all views.

"So you like this, Chris?" mom asked. "You seem to be admiring the way you
look! You like it?"
"Uh, yes!" I answered sheepishly.
"Boys, what do you think?"
"He looks cute!" said Dean.
"Yeah! He looks just like a baby!" remarked Sam.
"What do you think, Chris?" Dean asked me.
"Uh, well, they're okay!" (they were GREAT, but I didn't want them to
know), "I didn't think you guys would be changing me!" I replied. I began to wonder how my pants would fit over the diaper as it was indeed
quite bulky.
"Do you want me to put my pants back on now?" I asked Mom.
"Oh, no, Chris. You won't be wearing any pants, except for when you're in
school and when you're in town with me. Your pants are gone now! I took them to
Goodwill along with your underwear, since you won't be needing them anymore!"
What will I wear to school?" I asked.
"Tomorrow I'll get you a pair to wear to school. I'll measure you with the
diaper on so I'll know what size to get." She then left the room carrying the
pants and the underwear I was wearing earlier.
I went through my closet and noted that the blankets that at one time
concealed my soiled underwear had been moved. More notably, all of my pants were
gone. Even my shorts and my swimming trunks were taken away. All that remained
in my closet were my shirts. I walked over to my diaper drawers. The top drawer,
which once had underwear in it, was empty. The second drawer was half full of
diapers. The third drawer was stuffed entirely with diapers. I opened the fourth
drawer and noticed that I still had my socks and my white undershirts that I
wore to bed.
I started to walk out to the living room. I stopped and turned to around
to ask mom something.
"Mom? How long will this last?"
"Oh, I don't know. Awhile."
"How long is that?"
"For as much I spent on your diapers, I'll make sure it lasts a long time!
And I'll be buying more soon."
I could count on at least several months of this treatment. So far, so
good. I was wearing diapers, and only diapers, which I wanted, and my brothers
would be doing most of the changing, something I didn't care for, but hoped to
get accustomed to after awhile. I also knew that this would last for a long, yet
an undetermined length of time. I didn't want it to ever end! But still, there
had to have been more to all of this. After all, this was for "punishment!"
which, for now, I didn't feel it was.
11123111.title: Yes

111231111.content:
As I saw it, getting caught was a victory for me. I didn't plan on things
to turn out this way, but. Originally, I wanted to avoid getting caught, but I
planned my avoidance rather poorly.
I never considered the fact that mom may do the laundry earlier than I
expected her to. She ALWAYS did laundry in the afternoon, after we got home from
school, so I figured I'd just wait until she was doing my underwear, and then
try to sneak the dirty pairs into the wash while she went into another room to
retrieve more laundry. It was, as I thought about it, a risky plan.
Mom was behind on everyone's laundry. It had been several days since she
had been in my room to retrieve my laundry. As I waited for the day she'd
finally get to it, my underwear just kept piling up in the closet. The smell was
becoming too strong to mask by stuffing it under blankets in my closet. Mom must
have planned to get an early start on it today to get it caught up. After she
found the incriminating evidence, that was it! She gave up on me and I got back
the diapers I so long missed!
I went out to the living room, where I joined Sam to watch the afternoon
cartoons. It felt funny, yet good, to be in diapers, knowing that these were
only the first few minutes of what I expected to be possibly (and hopefully)
many months, perhaps years, of being in diapers. A few things would take getting
used to. First and foremost was dealing with my brothers. They were going to see
me in diapers like this all the time, and having them change me would definitely
take some getting used to. It felt awkward trying to walk with the diapers, so
I'd have to adjust the way I walked. One thing was certain-- and I didn't mind
adjusting to it-- when I needed to go to the bathroom I wouldn't have to get up
anymore. I could just go wherever I was. This meant no more interrupted video
games, watching TV, or anything!
111231111.title: Rest of the night

1112311111.content:
It wasn't too long before I felt a need to pee. As I had been originally
taught to do, my first inclination was to get up and walk into the bathroom. Not
anymore. I had to re-program myself and undo all of that tedious toilet training
my mom put me through. It felt funny to just be sitting there in the living room
needing to go to the bathroom. I hesitated on the thought of actually using the
diapers right out in front of everyone.
Finally, I started. It was a small trickle, a "shy pee!" as I called it.
It then turned into a full stream. I could feel the wetness soaking the
absorbent layers of the diaper. The wetness of the urine around my skin was
quickly drawn away. Nobody could tell that I had wet!
It was almost five o-clock when I felt that there were more liquids that
my system had processed and were ready for drainage. I added to the wetness I
already put into the diaper earlier. Again, the diaper soaked it all up; it was
doing its job and serving its purpose quite nicely.

The evening closed in. Dad was expected home at around 5:30. As the day
turned to dusk, I began to get uneasy thinking about what dad would say. The
question I had was if my dad knew of this ahead of time? I got up and walked
into the kitchen where mom was preparing dinner.
"Mom? Does dad know about this?" I asked.
"You'll find out when he gets home."
In the way she said that, it sounded like I was in for more, perhaps real
punishment. Punishment I wouldn't enjoy in the least. This diapers thing was
indeed punishment, but it was good punishment, an oxymoron if I ever heard one.
What more could they possibly do? Spank me? Ha! I wouldn't feel it if he did!
Now I knew what mom meant when she said that "spanking would do me no good when
she was through."

The moment had arrived-- dad drove in. He came into the kitchen from the
garage. I just sat there on the floor, anticipating his entry into the living
room. The room was dark, lit only by the TV screen. Maybe he wouldn't see that
huge, bulging mass on my butt. He walked up to the lamp and turned it on, seeing
what mom had put on me.
"Hi, there, son! I see mom has finally done something about your toileting
habits, or shall I say LACK of toileting habits?"
"Did she tell you about this?" I asked him.
"Yes, she did. She called me this morning at the office and discussed your
little 'problem.' Your mother and I have known about this behavior of yours for
some time. We thought about putting you in diapers a long time ago, but we
figured you'd grow out of it, which you never did. Since you aren't going to
ever straighten up your act, we are going to take extreme measures, hoping you
will realize how ridiculous and babyish this behavior is! You're eight years
old, but, you might as well be two!
"I'm sure your mother has told you of what to expect from now on. By now
your brothers should know what you have been doing, and I'm sure they, too, know
what to expect from now on. We'll discuss this more after dinner. Do you have
anything to say, Chris?"
As it seemed like dad expected an apology from me, I said "I'm sorry,
dad."
"'Sorry' won't change what you have coming! Anything else?"
It turned out he wasn't waiting for an apology, he just wanted to know if
I had any more questions. I did have one.
"Who else knows about this?" I asked dad.
"So far, nobody but the family knows-- me, your mother, Dean and Sam.
Others will certainly find out about your behavior, and what has been done about
it. So if you think this will remain a secret, it won't! I think when other
people find out why we are doing this, they'll understand. We might even be
setting a precedent in dealing with children who exhibit your behavior.
Certainly, Chris, you are not the only one who likes pooping in his pants! We're
just doing something about it that we think will make you think about this
behavior for awhile!"

I was definitely thinking about it! The diapers only made me think about
it, and act upon it even more!
By this time dinner was ready. We all sat around the table, just like a
traditional family. We ate the main course, then dessert. It was dinner the way
we had it every night, except now that I was wearing diapers for the first time
since I was nearly five. In fact, most other things in our family's customs and
routines remained the same except for that I was in diapers and that my brothers
had the additional responsibility of changing them. After dinner, mom and dad
cleaned up the table and the kitchen while we kids ran back out to the living
room.
After dinner we all gathered in the living room and discussed the fact
that I was to be wearing diapers and how wearing them would be enforced. Over
the course of our discussion, it was made clear that:

* I would be wearing diapers at all times, including school and in public.
* I was not to wear pants nor do anything to conceal my diapers except when
leaving the house. I was to be furnished with a larger pair of pants that would
fit over my diapers.
* Since I wasn't expected to go outside and leave the house in my diapers, I was
more or less grounded as well.
* I was not to change my own diapers. This was to be done by another member of
the family. Most often it would be done by my brothers, whose allowances were
doubled for this duty.
* My diapers were to be checked at least three times a day; once in the morning,
once in the afternoon, (after school on school days), and once before bedtime.
* No exceptions were to be made whatsoever. Mainly, I would have to remain in
diapers regardless of who was visiting our house. I was, however, welcome to
invite friends over, knowing that I would have to remain in my diapers in their
presence.

Much of this I was already aware of. I got thinking about the fact that my
brothers must each have four or five friends that visit regularly. I had to
accept the fact that they would all eventually see me wearing diapers.
"I should invite Adam over tonight!" said Dean. "I think she'll like to
see how adorable you look in your diapers!"
"Yeah, and I'm sure my friend Gina would like to see you, too, Chris!"
said Sam. "She thinks it's funny enough you go around in your underwear!
Wait'll she sees your diapers!"
As for my own friends, the only kid in school I considered to be a friend
was Tony. Like me, he was quiet and didn't talk to a lot of other kids, which
explained why neither of us had very many other friends. I had known him since
the first day in kindergarten, long enough to trust him to tell him I enjoyed
wearing diapers. I even trusted him enough not to tell everyone at school about
it, so I really didn't mind if he knew. As a matter of fact, I thought it might
be great to have a friend to share in this diaper fun of mine.
The only thing that I didn't like about this arrangement was having to
wear the diapers to school. I'd probably be the only third-grader-- perhaps the
only kid in the entire school--who wore diapers. If I knew of at least one kid,
even if he were a only a first-grader who wore diapers, I'd feel better about
wearing diapers to school knowing that I wasn't the one and only kid with such a
distinction.
"Do I really have to go to SCHOOL like this?" I asked my parents.
"Of course you do!" my mom affirmed. "NOTHING is open to negotiation! Get
used to it, Chris, because it's going to be this way for a long time!" At that
time she measured my waist with the diaper over it so she could get me the right
size of pants to wear to school.
The family meeting was adjourned and everyone went back to their normal
routines. Sam and I played Nintendo while Dean chatted on the phone. In the
background I could hear him talking to Adam. I tried to concentrate on the
game, but I was playing lousy because I was really concentrating more on what
Dean was saying to Adam, instead, mainly if Dean would tell her about my
diapers.
"Can you stay over tonight, Adam?" he asked.
No, not tonight! I was just getting used to having my own brothers see me
in diapers. I didn't want the whole world seeing me in them all at once!
"Oh, okay, well..." Good! It sounded like Adam couldn't make it over
tonight.
"Tomorrow night? Great! Boy, do I have something to show you then!" Dean
exclaimed. I knew exactly what he was talking about.
1112311111.title: You need to pee

choices: Wake up in middle of the night
11123111111.content:
Sitting there maneuvering my space ship on the screen, I felt nature
calling again, this time it was Number Two. I tried not to make it obvious, so I
tried to go while sitting on the floor. I did it earlier when I only had to pee.
Pooping while sitting wasn't as easy. I also didn't want my game to be
interrupted, one of the benefits of wearing diapers, so I tried to let it out.

Before I got put into diapers, I was always messing in my underwear in the
privacy and the confinement of my bedroom. Now, there I was, in such enormously
bulky diapers, sitting next to my brother, playing a video game, and needing to
unload my bowels. It wasn't exactly what I was used to, so I felt a bit awkward
to just let it out right there. I didn't want Sam to notice anything, but he
knew what I was doing when I changed my sitting position to where I was
squatting down with my legs spread wide.
I started to unload into my diaper. I felt it fill up the tight space
between the diaper and my buttocks. Within a few seconds or so I had a full load
in my diaper. I knew that I would have to be changed soon.
"So, did you just poop?" Asked Sam.
After we finished playing the game, mom came into the room and informed me
that it was time for my nighttime changing.
"Okay, Sam, Dean. I'll show you how to clean up and change Chris."
We went into my room to my changing pad. Without being told, I sat down on
the pad and prepared for the diaper change. Mom released the closures and pulled
off the diaper, all soaked with pee and soiled with poop. "I see you've used it
already, Chris!" commented mom. "Your poo-poo looks pretty fresh; you must've
just gone a few minutes ago!"
Mom pulled the diaper away from my body, leaving me naked from the waist
down. She went on explaining the procedure to Dean and Sam. "Now, Dean, Sam,
this is important: make sure you clean him up good before you put clean diapers
on him again."
The smell of my wastes filled the air around us.
"Phew, you stink, Chris!" said Dean.
"You'd better get used to it!" said mom.
Mom continued with her demonstration. She told me to lie on my back and
lift my legs as she wiped my butt clean and rubbed my diaper area. She sprinkled
powder on me and then turned the job over to Dean, giving him a chance to get
hands-on diapering experience. He slid the big diaper underneath me and
fastened the closures. He did it with such expertise, as if he had already
changed my diapers a hundred times before.
"Now, take the dirty diaper, put it in the plastic bucket and carry it out
to the garage just outside the laundry room. There's a hamper out there just for
his diapers, to keep the smell out of the house."
Dean and Sam then learned that earning twice their former allowances
would involve more than just changing me three times a day. "Now, in addition to
changing Chris, you'll need to wash his diapers, too!" mom added.
"Wash them? Eww!"
"I didn't double your allowances for nothing! I think changing him three
times a day and washing his diapers really isn't too much to ask for a 100%
raise in your allowances!"
"Okay, mom, we'll do it!" Dean acquiesced, though he didn't sound quite
so willing to accept this responsibility. "How often do we need to wash them?"
"I wouldn't let it go for more than a day or two!" mom advised. It'll
really stink if you do. You should have smelled Chris' closet, Whooo! You
wouldn't believe how much disinfectant I used in there!"
I was finally set free. I grabbed my bucket of Legos and took them out to
the living room. Waddling like a toddler, I carried the bucket and set it down
in my playing corner. Mom and the boys were behind me, carrying the diaper
bucket to the garage.
We stayed up for about another hour and then went to bed. As I climbed
into bed, I heard a crinkling sound beneath my sheets. It was plastic! My mom
had put a plastic sheet on my mattress! Somehow I enjoyed hearing the plastic
ruffling as I moved around on the bed. My room also smelled of baby powder,
though blended with the scent of the disinfectant. The feel and the sight of the
diapers on me along with the sounds and smells made these diapers appeal to
nearly all of my senses. Within a few minutes I settled down. It felt weird
sleeping this way and it took some getting used to, mainly, the diaper forced me
to keep my legs spread widely apart while lying down, a position I wasn't
accustomed to for sleeping. I hoped that I would wet or mess in the diaper
before falling asleep, but I ended up dozing off instead, still dry.
11123111111.title: Messy Time

1113.content:
You've always liked diapers as long as you can remember. Even after being potty trained you've had an interest in them and secretly hoped you could still wear them. This weekend would be the perfect opportunity to make your dream come true, since your parents had trusted you enough to leave you home alone for the weekend while they would be out of town. The only person who knew your secret was your best friend and you two had already agreed that you would get to play baby when you got the chance. And this was the time.

Is your friend a boy or a girl?
1113.title: You like them

11131.content:
Your parents left early in the morning and now you had the house for yourself. You anxiously waited for your friend Kevin to arrive for the sleepover since you didn't want to wait any longer. About half an hour later you heard the doorbell ring and there he was, finally.

''Did you get all the stuff?'' you ask excitedly. ''Sure did. Diapers, wipes, powder, everything. Even a potty chair just in case you want to be a big boy.'' You couldn't help a big smile spreading across your face, finally your dream would become reality. ''Wow, someone looks excited!'' Kevin laughed. ''Looks like you don't wanna wait anymore, come on.'' You almost ran to your room, took off your pants and hopped on your bed and waited for the diaper to be put on. ''Are you sure you know how to do this?'' Kevin laughed at your question and replied ''Relax, I got a baby brother so I'm familiar with diapers - even the messy ones'' he chuckled. You eagerly lifted up your butt as he started putting the diaper on you. He was quickly done and you got up to look at yourself from a mirror. The diaper fit you perfectly and you instantly felt like a baby, standing there wearing nothing but a baby diaper with cute prints. ''Aww doesn't baby Jacob look cute! And the diaper fits just fine.'' he said and added ''just use it whenever you feel the need to go pee or poo, I'll change you into a clean one.''

Now that you're diapered it's time for...
11131.title: Boy

111312.content:
You crawl on the floor wearing just a diaper and spend the next hour playing with some toys. You feel the need to use the toilet and try to go in your diaper but your brain fights the idea of wetting yourself and you only manage to do a small trickle of pee into your diaper. ''Does baby Jacob wanna watch some cartoons?'' Kevin suggests. You nod and he puts the tv on and then picks you up and you sit on his lap. You try to pee but to your disappointment nothing comes out so for a while you just focus on the tv. Soon he starts rocking you on his knee and this causes you to lose control of your bladder. You watch the diaper fill up with such pressure that for a second you fear it's going to leak, but it manages to absorb it all. Kevin notices this and squeezes the front of your diaper ''Looks like someone had a little accident!''

You also feel the need to poop but aren't sure if you're ready to mess a diaper, especially in front of your friend. ''Umm...I kinda need to poop too...'' you say sheepishly. ''Well that's why you have that diaper on, you know.'' Kevin says with a smile. ''Or would you prefer using the potty this time?''
111312.title: Play

1113121.content:
"No, I'll try using my diaper" you said a little nervous. You got on your knees and started to push, you can hear Kevin gently encocourage you. You started to grunt and push harder...you sarted to feel it poking out of your bum! And finally you felt it go out of your bum, and press up against you and the diaper.
"Good job buddy" Kevin exclaimed proudly." Do you want to have brekfast now, or do you want to be changed"
1113121.title: Go in the diaper

11131212.content: "I'm kinda hungry" you said after a momemt of thinking."Okay" Kevin said calmly. "But, after brekfast your being changed." You just noded compliantly. You saw him go into the kitchen to warm up your bottle, you sat down momentarily forgetting about your messy diaper. And it squished all over your back side,you giggle at the feeling of being a baby. Just then you felt yourself being lifted onto Kevin's lap and your bottle was quickly placed in your mouth. You suckled gently enjoying the warm milk slide down your throat, after you had finished it, you went to go lie down on the changing matt to prepare for your diaper change.
11131212.title: Have brekfast

111312121.content:
You close your eyes and suck on your pacifier as Kevin removes the dirty diaper and starts cleaning your bum. You feel like a real baby when he laughs and comments on how wet and messy your diaper is. It takes quite a while for him to clean up all the poop and after about 15 minutes you feel a new diaper being attached on you. The car drive was going to be a few hours, there were a few stops along the way but you weren't sure whether or not you'd hold up, luckily for you Zach seemed too focused on singing, well what he called singing, along with the showtunes playing in the car. "I'm telling you, you're going to love it!" Zach cheered. "My uncle is really chill as well he's the best!" You smile as Zach continued to enthuse about the resort, you had no doubt that you were going to enjoy it.

Several hours and a few diaper changes later you arrived at the resort. It was ever bit as amazing as Zach said it was, you both head out of the car and Zach waved goodbye to his mum, it was just going to be you and Zach for the rest of the summer.

1141.content:
You have a rather embarrassing problem since you turned 16 years old - Urinary incontinence. Quite common for young kids especially during the night, but this sudden condition occurred without warning after years of being able to control your bladder. Now it wasn't as if you couldn't completely control your bladder as for the most part, you were able to reach the bathroom in time with little to no leak; however, anytime you were becoming nervous or during the night, you knew you were going to leak. You went to the doctor many times and the only option was to perform surgery; however, your parents didn't like the idea, so they decided to just to adapt to the situation.

Therefore, diapers were a necessity for you, even if you didn't like it. Due to your fear of leaking and finding out about wearing diapers, you didn't attempt to make any new friends and began to drift away from your old friends. If there was only one person that you knew you could rely on completely and trust, it was your step-mother, Jennifer  . Your father, Dale pretty much stayed out of the way and let his wife handle your needs.

Jennifer married your father when you were 15 years old, so it was been three years. You weren't really close and couldn't really see her as your mother since she was pretty young, being only 28; however, once you became unexpectedly incontinent, she was the one who truly came to support you and help you calm down. It sounded odd, but incontinence helped create a bond that you thought wouldn't exist.

Increasingly though, you couldn't help but notice that she was becoming a bit too...attached. She was understandably concerned, but you were sometimes overwhelmed by her tendency to spoil you. Being the only son, you once asked her if you would be considering any children of her own, but worryingly, she felt that you were enough.

Of course, this was only the beginning as your world would shift dramatically.

Where will you begin?

You were on vacation with your family in California. It was unusually hot and humid today though which left your parents, Melissa and Ben, exhausted from driving, even with the air conditioning on.

Sitting in the back of the car as your parents were eager to look for a nice hotel to relax and take a nap until the day got cooler, you glanced to your sister, Jen, who was about two years older than you at 20 (Preview  . She was looking out the window with her headphones on, not paying attention to anything particular in the car. Her body was very bodacious and you were proud to admit you had a rather curvy sister who you got along with. Although there were times you argued, you both compromised. Of course, now that you were both older, she eventually distanced herself from the family, going out with her friends. You didn't particularly mind but it was nice to have her presence for vacation...even if she was not really conversing with anyone.

You sighed and took a look at your mother who was reading a book on her tablet. She was also very thin and it was clear she was very young compared to most mothers. She had your sister at 18 after getting pregnant by her boyfriend, now husband. Of course, she later had you two years later. For someone who had two pregnancies, she was like a model  . Your father was especially lucky and your sister was lucky for getting much of her mother's genetics. At times, it was difficult for you to be around her for...obvious reasons. You loved your mother, but she was too curvaceous for her own good.

As for you, at 18, you were a little short at 5'4" inches where average in your family was 5'9". This meant you were the shortest in your family which caused some teasing, but you had grown used to it. Apparently, it was a recessive gene that you only got from your father. Other than that, you were of average build, a little skinny but mainly due to your high metabolism.

"Ah...here we are," your father announced causing everyone to pay attention towards the front of the car. You saw a rather simplistic hotel; however, notably it was near the beach while was a primary reason to stay at California for vacation.

Melissa hummed, pulling her lips to the side. "It's a little plain honey, but the location is perfect, at least."

Ben shrugged. "That's what matters, right? Plus, I booked a room at a great price. I think it'll be fine."

Jen took off her headphones and narrowed her eyes. "I just hope it's not too small."

Ben shrugged your sister's concerns away. "I don't think that'll be a problem. I've read the reviews, people say its a decent place."

Jen simply hummed, deciding to defer any impressions until they actually got into their room. As for you, it didn't matter as long as the room was good enough to sleep comfortably.

Parking the car near the hotel entrance, the staff handled the parking of the car as well as luggage which was particularly nice for a plain-looking hotel. They had to make something up for the plain look, so you figured the service had to be great for it to get decent reviews.

Near the check-in, your father met a rather rough looking man who smiled brightly. The check-in was smooth and the employee gave the key to the room. As your family left, you were suddenly stopped by the rough-looking man as he reached out to put a hand to your shoulder. You jumped, not expecting such a move and couldn't pull away.

You were left feeling a little uncomfortable as the man examined you for a moment and then smiled. "I think you'll enjoy this hotel particularly, young man. As plain as this hotel looks, there are some people who says it has changed their life."

He let go of your shoulder and you raised your eyebrows. "I...see. Why is that?"

The rough-man chuckled. "Oh you'll find out. There's a special secret to this whole area. When you go to sleep tonight, I hope you have pleasant dreams."

"Okay..." you drawled, backing away. What exactly did he mean? You weren't about to dwell on it. You came here with your family to have fun and relax. At such a plain-looking hotel, you weren't going to expect any life-changing moment.

You rushed a little to get back to your family and finally reached your room. Your father put in the keys and opened it. You raised your eyes in surprise. It was quite spacious with at least two beds and a couch. You figured you were small enough to sleep on the couch and it was likely, that was what would be arranged.

The luggages and cases arrived to your room soon after everyone examined it. Appeared everyone was quite satisfied. There was a kitchen, a balcony with a great view of the beach, a large bathroom, and room to move between the couch and beds.

Clapping his hands, he looked around and then grinned. "Alright, I'm beat and going to take a nap. I think you all should too until it gets cooler outside. Where's our little man going to sleep though."

You rolled your eyes. In every hotel, it was down to you. I decided to volunteer myself. "I'll just sleep on the couch...like usual."

Your mother frowned. "Sweetie, you don't have to if you don't want to. You can sleep with me and your father. The beds are big enough."

I froze a little but tried to remain compose. Your mother was always the concerned one. She had offered to have you sleep with her multiple times outside; however, you always declined...for obvious reasons.

To your surprise, you felt your sister place her hands on your shoulders causing you to flinch. She looked over to her parents. "I don't mind if he wants to sleep with me."

Your father raised his eyebrows. "Jen, that's sweet of you. Are you sure?"

Jen shrugged. It appeared she was doing a lot of that recently. "It's fine. It's been a while since my little bro and I slept together, isn't that right?"

You pulled away and groan. "You say it as if I'm a kid..."

Your sister grinned. "Oh...I wasn't talking in terms of age."

You tuned your sister out. Of course, it always came back to your size. That was the joke.

You looked at everyone. Your whole family didn't appear to mind where you slept. You curled your lips and contemplated.

1211.content:
Elise was a bedwetter. No matter what she or her family tried, she could never wake up dry. Her friends at school were pretty understanding. She was even invited to a few slumber parties and her diapers scarcely mattered. The one person who seemed to have any real objection to Elise's diaper problem was her older sister, the 16 year old Franny.

Franny was tall, athletic, and mean. Her hair was bleached blonde, and she was always working out, conditioning herself for running track or basketball. Elise feared Franny, since Franny could probably beat up six Elise-sized girls at once in a fight if she wanted to. Not only that, but Franny loved going out of her way to torment and humiliate poor little Elise, and her bedwetting was the cheapest, easiest shot there was.

Elise was sleeping in her bed on a lazy Saturday morning. She was wearing only a pajama top and her diaper. She rarely wore her pajama bottoms, since they didn't fit so well over her diapers. Elise's parents bought the thickest, most absorbent diapers they could find. They were so thick that Elise could barely walk in them, only waddle most of the time.

Franny abruptly grabbed Elise by her pajama top, lifting her above her bed. Elise woke up from her peaceful slumber screaming and peeing herself.
"Wahhh! What's going on?" Elsie screamed.
Franny laughed. Elise always peed when woken up too quick.
"Woo, Elise, you smell like a toilet." She said, still laughing. She pulled off Elise's pajam top, leaving the ten-year-old wearing only her soggy used diaper.
"Give it back!" Elise said.
"Nah, you look cuter like this, so babyish. Now, cry for me, baby!" Franny said, laughing.
Elise was too strong to give up and cry this easy.

Franny took Elise over to her window and opened the screen frame with her feet. Being able to use her strong legs so well was an advantage of being tall and athletic. Some of them had something as superficial as a large scar or burn mark on their face that they had to try and cover up with makeup, while others had a deformed hand or a club foot. A fellow student entered the bathroom and noticed Elise and Kasey washing their hands at the sink. Kasey and Elise whirled round and noticed Abby standing near the bathroom door looking distressed.

"What's wrong, Abby?" Elise inquired, speaking in a soft tone.

Without prompt, Abby lifted her skirt well above her stomach to reveal her wet diaper in front of the two students without shame. "I dee-- did a-- an 'uh oh'." Her speech was broke apart and her balance shook while her hands gripped her skirt, legs visibly wobbling as she concentrated on doing more than one thing at a time.

"That's alright," Elise smiled, "I'll change your wet diaper."

It was easy to forget that the school specialized in students with disabilities of all kinds. The physical being easier to see and understand while students with mental disabilities were harder to understand and were often approached with a sense of uncertainty.

Abby was one of the examples of a student with a mental disability: An eight year old girl with the mentality of a toddler -- unable to think for herself while tasks such as walking, talking and using her arms and legs were met with great difficulty. A pacifier strapped to her t-shirt was swinging back and forth, with visible beads of drool dripped from the edge of the amber nipple and onto the bathroom floor.

It felt nice for Elise to be able to relate to other students who shared her 'issue'.

Abby slowly toddled over to a nearby changing table, still holding her skirt above her stomach, and sat down with a loud thud. Her grip on the skirt loosened and she found interest in chewing on her fingers.

With Abby lying on the mat, Kasey stepped to the other side of the changing table and caught Abby's attention with a smile.

"Aren't you supposed to go to the nurse when your diaper is wet?" Kasey cooed, she dipped her fingers into Abby's long brown hair to perform a comforting stroke.

Kacey and Elise's bedroom was modest for girls their age. A minute later, and she walked over to the mini-fridge and pulled out several drinks, one of them being in a large baby bottle.

"Here," Kacey handed Elise a small lemonade, "We're not supposed to be drinking this, but--"

"--We've got a guest." Elise finished, happily accepting the drink. "We've got a guest, and you're happy to take off your uniform?"

Kacey shrugged, "It's just Abby," nodding in her friends direction. "She's wearing a diaper too, y'know."

Abby rested on the large beanie chair for her own protection. The overgrown toddler stared at the ceiling and kicked her legs around on the floor without a hint of co-ordination or sense. Her hands softly gripped onto the surface of the beanie chair, becoming amazed by the way the chair molded its shape to her touch.

"It's time for 'baba', Abby!" Her empty gaze towards the ceiling faded when she scanned the room and noticed Kacey holding an all-too familiar baby bottle in her hand.

Judy was on her way home from school when her friend, Diane walked over. Diane was one of the cool kids, so Judy felt it was an honor to be on her good side. She was a blonde headed girl with an athletic build for her young age.
"Hey Judy! Me, Caroline and Sally were talking about having a sleepover slumber party type thing this weekend. I was thinking about inviting you, but I heard a rumor..." Diane said.
Judy's blood ran cold. She had never been invited to a sleepover before, sand feared they might have known about her bedwetting.
"What rumor is that, Diane?" Judy said.
"Ha, it's pretty silly, but I heard in the cafeteria that you wet the bed and wear diapers like a baby at night. It's not for real, is it?" Diane said.
Judy was torn. She really REALLY wanted to go to this sleepover, but she also thought it was best to tell the truth. If she went, everyone would know anyway.
"Um... Uh... Yeah, I have accidents at night BUTPLEASELETMEGOTOYOURSLEEPOVERHONESTIWON'TRUINIT... PLEASE?" Judy begged.
"Ha, calm down, Judy. Yeah, you can go. You're our friend, you know. We still like you whether you need diapers or not... baby." Diane joked.
"Oh, thank you! Thank you! Thank you!" Judy said, jumping up and down.
"Now, you know we're going to make fun of you at least a little, right?" Diane said.
Judy didn't care. She had a chance to hang with the cool kids now. Diapers or not, she would get to be cool, even if she was going to be their little joke.
"Ha, I can take a joke, I don't mind." Judy said.
"Cool. Just don't lame it up, you know. Other than the baby diapers, you're all right, Judy. see ya tonight." Diane said.

Judy rushed home and told her mom about the sleepover. Her mom had a hard time believing her when Judy said they didn't mind the diapers, but Judy's mom agreed to drive Judy there after dinner. Judy packed a sleeping bag and her pajamas, which only consisted of a top since her diapers were too thick for pajama bottoms and nighties were for lame girls. Judy hoped they wouldn't mind seeing her diaper at night. She also packed a change of clothes, some diapers, and a few bags of chips for snacking that she could share with the other girls.

Judy's mom made some chicken and rice for dinner. Judy ate her portion pretty quick. She couldn't wait to go to the party. She was left waiting for her mom, dad, and sister Wendy to finish eating before she could go.

Judy was the last one to arrive for the sleepover. Diane's mom was leaving for romantic weekend with her husband for the weekend, and trusted Diane and her friends. They were going to spend the night in a luxurious hotel in a big city a few miles away. Judy got there just as they were leaving.
"Ah you must be one of Diane's buddies. Don't play with knives or fire while we're gone and do go in our room, all right?" Diane's dad said.
"Yes sir!" Judy said.

"Ah, Judy, you're here! Great to see you!" Diane said, welcoming Judy in the foyer. She gave Judy a big hug.
"This is Caroline, and this is Sally." Diane said.
Caroline had long black hair and was already in her pajamas, which had little prisms with splitting light all over them, like the cover of Dark Side Of The Moon. Sally had short red hair and was in a white T-shirt with a dolphin on it and a pair of shorts. Diane was dressed similarly to Sally, but with a magenta shirt.
"So, first thing we have planned is we're watching 'Mamma Mia'! Sounds cool?" Diane said.
"Cool!" Judy said.

Judy sat down with an iced tea and watched the fun little musical movie with Diane, Caroline, and Sally. They sang along with many of the songs and rewound it a couple times to listen to their favorites twice. Judy did notice she had to get up to use the bathroom a lot, but that was because she was drinking so much iced tea. By the time they were done watching the movie it was already nine-thirty at night.
"Well, it's getting kinda late. I'm changing into my PJ's." Said Diane.
"Yeah, I'll change too." said Sally.
Wanting to fit in, Judy went into a bathroom to change herself. She stripped naked and opened up a diaper. She powdered herself, taped it up, and put on her blue pajama top. Her legs were totally exposed, and he diaper was clearly visible. Nervously, Judy walked out to meet the other girls.

Caroline was still wearing her prism patterned pajamas, while Sally now wore a longer plain white T-shirt and a pair of red panties that sometimes poked out from under. Apparently she wasn't into traditional pajamas. Diane was wearing a sleeveless pajama top and pink pajama bottoms. The other girls giggled a bit seeing Judy in her bulky white diaper. Judy was a little embarrassed and blushed.
"Oh man, Diane, you weren't kidding. She does wear diapers." Sally said, laughing hardest.
"Yep, like a cute little baby." Diane said, patting Judy on the head. Judy awkwardly laughed.
"Come on, up to my room. Grab your stuff, all of you." Diane said.
The girls gathered up their things and spread their sleeping bags out on Diane's floor. Diane pulled out an old empty Sprite bottle.

"All right, girls, the name of the game is 'Truth or Dare'! I spin the bottles, and if it lands on you, you get to choose. Whoever the last person who had to do a truth or dare decides what the next person's truth or dare is, all right?" Diane said.
The other girls all already knew how to play, but it was part of the formality to say it out loud before starting. They nodded their heads in agreement. They all sat in a circle as Diane spun the bottle. It slowly came to a halt and landed on...
JUDY!
"Oh, the new girl gets to go first, huh? What'll it be, truth or dare?" Diane said.
