Erica looks mildly disappointed for a split second before smiling, giving off a cheery "Alright! Good luck, bigger babies mean bigger messes!" Before wandering off to help some of the younger kids.

Dawn looks down at you and smirks, living you up (shockingly easily), one hand wrapped around your waist, and the other supporting your messy bottom.

"Alright Squirt, let's head somewhere a little more "private", those big girl parts of yours are for big girl eyes only." She raises her voice during the latter half of the sentence, clearly targeted at Erica as she glares briefly in her direction. Erica blushes deep crimson as you're carried to the back, mumbling something about "panicking" and how "I do it that way for all of the kids...." while Dawn grabs a changing mat, shoving it between you and her quickly and continuing her stride.

As soon as you head through the childproofed door separating the Designated Kid's Area and the Break Room, Dawn's attitude quickly shifts from mildly antagonistic to softer, warmer matronly tones as she giggles quietly into your shoulder. Her pace slows as she gently carries you to a spare cot in the back of the store, setting you down gently on the floor as she prepares the changing supplies.

"Sorry for bein' a little snarky back there," she says, startling you as you spit your paci out from shock. "I'm sort of the only real 'discipline' around here, and if I start acting soft, who knows what those kids'll get up to."

As she picks up the pacifier and gently pushes it to your lips, you realize just how.... well, beautiful Dawn is. You hadn't worked with her much in the few days you'd been there, but she was noticeably strong yet compact, only about three or four inches taller than you with a bodybuilder's musculature. Her dark complexion and even darker freckles give her rounder face a youthful appearance.

As she sets you on the bed, you squish the mess on your bottom down even more, letting a low whine escape your throat as you feel equal parts embarrassed and... something slightly different.

Dawn giggles at your display, pushing you gently on to your back and giving your exposed messy padding a few more squishes as you writhe and wiggle, moaning a little as you begin to press back against her hand.

"Looks like Little Baby Jen-Jen is enjoying herself today, isn't she?" She says, stopping to finally get the change underway.

As she changes you, you manage to restrain yourself from self-humiliation further, pushing away thoughts of humping her hand as best you can while she continues on.

"So, here's the deal squirt: Me and anyone out here with eyes can tell you have a crush on the Boss Lady." You blush and try to look away as she leans in and whispers to you "It's fine girl, we all do."

You stare into her eyes, unbelieving as she continues on. "Look, all of the people working here are women, 70% of them are gay or bi, and the few straight ones that are left have all told me, the local 'gay gal' how they'd totally get with Erica. She's a walking goddess...." She says, clearly getting lost in her own daydream.

She shakes her head. "-And anyways, don't think you're a weirdo for this fantasy here. Everyone seems to have these kinds of daydreams around Erica, all about bein' pampered and stuff. Mommy issues are a silent killer, huh Hun?"

She finishes her cleanup routine, pulling the diaper back up and giving you a few gentle pats to the crinkly padding as she sits you up, sitting down next to you on the bed herself.

"Wait, so, I'm the first one to like.... do this around her? Even though everyone else has the same thoughts?" you mumble around the paci, puzzled.

Dawn lifts up your shirt to your surprise, removing all of your clothes in a swift and brief manner as she speaks. "Yeah, though to be fair, you've fallen the hardest for her, and in the shortest time too. I mean, I'm a Dom, so I wasn't about to walk up to the Boss and tell her to mess herself like a baby and...." She starts getting lost in her thoughts again, and you giggle as you see her hands start to wander to her crotch.

She snaps out of it and blushes, smirking at you. "Yeah yeah, I know. Look, for the time being, I'll keep you back here. There's plenty of kiddie junk stored back here for ya, and as cute as you are, I think the whole.... "Big Girl" part of this for ya ain't suitable around the kids."

You grimace, realizing that had this change happened out in the main room, you might have been out of a job.

"It's fine, don't worry Jenna. Look, just keep doing what you're doing, and Erica will jump on you like a..... Well, you get the picture."

"In fact," Dawn continues, smiling wickedly, "I think I might have something that could help the odds....."

She leaves briefly, and as your naked breasts start to finally feel a little too chilly to be comfortable......
124321121111.title: Erica replies "alright"

Jenna smiled through her pacifier as Erica walked away.

Another story idea. 18 year old teen has a strange dream where she acquires the ability to make her wishes come true. There are some limitations though. She cannot wish to physically harm someone, make someone fall in love with her, or wish for money. She also must state her wishes out loud and if anyone hears it will not come true.

Second choice is for different type of storyline.

124331.content:
18 year old Paige was having a strange dream. She was alone in a white room and a voice started speaking to her. The voice said: "Hello, Paige. I know your life has been stressful lately. I offer you a gift. When you awaken you may wish for things to become true by first saying I wish. You must say it out loud in order for it to work. If someone hears your wish it will not come true however. The other rules are you cannot wish for love, money, or to physically harm anyone else. Awake now and try it out."

You awaken remembering your dream as you brush some of your long blonde hair from your face. Shaking your head thinking it was just a dream. "I really doubt it was real but, I think I will make a wish just for fun." You begin staring at your dark green nightgown. "I wish a summer dress that is my size and the same color of green as my nightgown appears next to me on my bed." Your entire vision goes white for a second. A new dress has appeared right in front of you on your bed. "Wow!" you hear yourself say. You grab it to make sure it is real and you aren't imagining things. Sure enough you can feel it in your hands. You quickly get out of your bed and walk over to your mirror and place the dress in front of you. "Looks about my size." You say happily.

You make the decision to go shower and try on your new dress later. 20 minutes later you are in your home wrapped in a towel. "Time to get dressed." You quickly go to your dresser and take out a matching pair of green panties and bra and put them on. Next you slip on your new green dress and walk over to the mirror and look. "This looks great! I wonder what else I can wish for?"

the diaper was big enough to fit me!
1243311.content:
As you twirl around your dress in front of the mirror you start to feel a familiar feeling. The need to urinate. You don't really want to leave your room again quite yet. So you come up with a plan. "I know I can wish for a diaper like my little cousin wears!"

You pull off your panties and lift up your dress looking into the mirror. "I wish I was wearing a diaper like my four year old cousin Ivy wears!" A white flash comes once again and when it disappears you see the diaper in the mirror. You also feel it and it is very tight as it clearly doesn't fit. You were quite tall so you should have expected this. "Oh, I guess I should have specified it to fit."

What will you wish for next?

After standing around for a few minutes you try sitting and letting it out. It won't come out. Frustrated you decide to wish it out. "I wish the pee would go into my diaper right now!" With a white flash you feel your body letting your urine into your diaper. As you sit in front of the mirror you lift up the bottom of the dress to reveal your rapidly filling warm diaper. You can't help but think you look a little like your cousin right now in a dress and a wet diaper.

"This is kind of cute. I do look a little like my cousin right now. I should try to look more like her just for fun. "I wish my hair was in pigtails, I was wearing tights that fit perfectly matching my outfit, and I had a pacifier in my mouth "

After another white flash you look in the mirror to see your wish fulfilled. You stand up looking into the mirror and smile behind your pacifier. You take out the pacifier and laugh. You honestly really looked just like her with the pacifier and everything.

Spotting the toybox you move to it to pick out a few toys and sit on the ground with your legs spread revealing the diaper. After playing with the toys you begin to feel bored. The white flash comes again and you start playing. Soon enough you're really enjoying yourself to your amusement. Without thinking you let out a loud giggle behind your pacifier. This really was a lot of fun! You think you hear something.

"So, are you going to actually help Kristen, or are you just going to keep laughing at her?" Alice asked, sounding a bit irritated. "And where's the nurse, anyway?"

"Oh, calm your tits..." Ellie paused, realizing she had never met Alice before. "OMG, did you make a new friend, Krissy? Maybe she can start changing your diapers so I don't have to as much." She laughed again. "Anyway, the nurse is out at the moment."

Alice looked like she was about to yell at or hit Ellie before the bell rang. The two of them turned to Kristen, who had started crying, not loudly, but loud enough for the two of them to hear.

Ellie sighed, stepped closer to Kristen, and wrapped her arms around her. "Shh, it's okay, sweetie. Come on, let's get you changed." Ellie was gently stroking the back of Kristen's head. She looked back at Alice. "You should head to class. I'll take care of her."

Alice looked just a little perplexed at the situation. "You sure you'll be okay?" She asked Kristen, who nodded, her face buried in Ellie's shoulder.

Alice nodded at Ellie and left before Ellie opened a door to what looked like a large closet, revealing a changing table stocked with diapers and changing supplies. She took off Kristen's pants and patted the back of her diaper as she climbed on the table.

"That girl really seems to care about you." Ellie said as she started changing Kristen's diaper. She nodded in response, starting to smile a little, still crying.

"Here, come on inside." Danielle beckoned Alice inside. "Krissy, your friend is here!" Danielle yelled up the stairs.

"Okay, I'll be down in a minute!" Could be heard bellowing back down from the upper level. Danielle looked back at Alice and smiled again.

"Now, did Krissy tell you about our rule for her guests?" She asked Alice, getting a look of confusion and a shaken head in return. "Well, you know about Krissy's...condition, right?" Alice nodded. "I do, yes."

“Ehy, listen!” you said, stopping your walk and stomping your feet “I didn’t ask for this, you know? It was the truck driver fault! I had a brilliant career, and I demand to be treated like the woman I am, and not like a toddler!”
The angel looked back at you, sighed and said “Please, don’t do this. Behave.”
“No!” you exclaimed, pouting.
“Tessie!” he called your name with a firm voice, but without yelling “If you don’t behave, I have to punish you!”
You hesitated a little at his threat, but your pride was too strong and you exclaimed “Oh, and what can you do?! I’m already dead!”
The angel sighed, then, with a rapid movement, took your wrist and in a fraction of second you found yourself laying over his lap as he sat down over a chair appeared from nowhere.
“If you wish to find out how we treat naughty babies, Tessie, I will grant your wish.” he said, pulling down your pair of white transparent tights. The diaper soon followed them, reaching your ankles. So you found yourself bare bottomed.
“No! Don’t you dare!” you exclaimed.
Without answering anymore, the angel gave you five hard slaps. There wasn’t many, but they stung like hell.
You burst into tears after the second slap, and couldn’t stop it till the punishment was over.
Once the spanking stopped, the angel let you sit on his knees, with your bottom still bare, and, like following an instinct, you hugged him tightly.
“I’m sorry, I’m sorry!” you sobbed.
The angel cuddled you, singing you sweet lullaby till you were calm once again.
“Are you ready to meet the court, now?” he asked.
You looked at him, asking “What court?”
“The heaven court.” he explained “They will determine where you belong.”
“Can they send me to... hell?” you asked, a little afraid.
To your surprise, the angel laughed, and the replied “Oh, silly baby. There is no hell. It’s just a human invention. At worst, you will be send back to Earth in a difficult life condition. That is the worst punishment the gods assign.”
“The gods?” you asked, as the angel pulled your diaper and tights back up around your waist “There are many gods?”
“Of course.” the angel replied “We angels serve the gods. They are all children of the Father. He is, however, a being so high and strange that even we cannot understand him. So we consider the gods as our superiors, and the Father like something to acknowledge, but basically ignoring him.”
That said, the angel resumed to lead to across the white and shiny hallway, till you reached a big golden gate.
There, sat a female angel.
“Personal information, please?” she said, once you reached her.
“Well, my name...” you began to say, but were interrupted by the angel that was accompanying you.
He patted your head, saying “Hush, baby. The grownups are talking about you, not to you.”
As you blushed furiously for those words, he looked at the female angel, saying “Tessie Price. 29 years old. From New York. Car accident.”
The female angel wrote everything down, then snapped her fingers and the big golden gate opened up.
“Enjoy your stay, baby Tessie.” the female angel cooed, as your guide led you in.
Inside, the “haven court” (like the angel called it) was...

154.content:
All right, you're a demon that wears diapers. What kind of demon are you?

Succubus is a sexy lady demon that tries to make friends with humans. They are typically manipulative and selfish.

Incubus are handsome male demons. They also like humans, but see them as servants or minions who should do their bidding. They are typically domineering and greedy.

Demonic Spirits have no physical body, but they like to possess humans and take over their bodies. They generally dislike humans but think they're fun to torment. Maybe you're a Demonic spirit that wants to force the human you possess to wear diapers?
154.title: Demon

1542.content:
In hell, there was a clear hierarchy, Lord Satan was at the very top, he was the head demon and all others in hell bowed down to him, at the very bottom were what was known as Spectra demons, they were demons would haunted houses and other places, just above them were possession demons, they could possess people and animals, above them and only just below Lord Satan himself were Obsession demons, these were very powerful demons that haunted people, they often liked to torture, rape or scar humans. That was the ranking you fit into, the best of the best, they were considered the coolest demons out there. You were a young Incubus, you didn't have a name since you were never given one but you didn't mind, being an incubus you were incredibly good looking, you had toned skin with fiery red hair and perfect teeth, you had black and red demonic wings that you could retract and wore a simple dark red cloth that wrapped around your waist. Usually, Incubi were demons that raped young women in their sleep, they were highly feared by the public during the dark ages and many people put up wards around their houses to keep them out, none of them worked of course, that's what made it so funny. It was also said that anyone born from an Incubus raping a woman would be a witch, this also wasn't true. actually the baby would be given a demon's blessing, which means they could command demons and actually the only thing that repelled demons, that's why it was so fun to watch people burn these people who were their only hope of staying safe.

It was now your day, in human years you were hundreds of years old but in the demon equivalent you were probably seventeen, the time when Incubi claimed their first victim. You had never left hell before so this was incredibly exciting, there was a village you were spying on for a while, it was the same village every Incubi in your 'family' had gone to to claim their first victim, by family you were referring to the group of close knit demons you spent your life with, you were the youngest of them so the last to claim your victim. You flew around and spotted the perfect candidate, a woman in her early twenties, she had flawless skin and golden hair, you flew down and entered her house, it was nice, well furnished and homey, you were sure the child would like growing up in it, until they would be burnt at the stake of course. You approached the woman sleeping soundly and prepared to prove yourself, suddenly, there was a moment of hesitation.
1542.title: Incubus Reject

15422.content:
You stepped back, you couldn't do it, you don't know why, this girl was innocent, she didn't deserve this. You were confused, how were you feeling sympathy for her, you were a demon, completely void of any feelings of remorse, guilt or empathy, you were ashamed of yourself and you were certain Lord Satan would be furious. You quickly flew out of the house and into the streets, you looked around and changed your appearance to look more human, your wings retracted and you garments changed to match that of the village, you wanted to stay out of hell for as long as you could before facing Lord Satan, he would not be happy and his wrath was something you really didn't want to face. You still didn't get it, you were super excited about being able to finally go and rape your first victim, you didn't know what stopped you all of a sudden, you would have to be the first Incubus ever to back away from rape. You groaned loudly at the sheer failure you were.
"You shouldn't be out after dark kid," a woman similar age to the one you targeted earlier called, she had light brown hair and emerald eyes. "come in here, you'll be safe." You walk over to the lady and she leads you to the table. "I have charms all around the windows and doors, that way no demons could ever get in." You found it ironic that she said that considering she just openly let a demon into her home, but you'd have to keep that to yourself. "Where do you live anyway?" the woman asked, "I don't think I've seen you before."
"I'm not from here," you reply, she poured you a glass of water, naturally being a demon you didn't need to drink or eat but you did anyway to keep your cover.
"In that case stay the night, it's dangerous at night with all those demons outside," she offered.
"Why is this town so afraid of demons?" you asked, ok, just because you could rape that girl doesn't mean you aren't mischievous, you could still plant some paranoia in this woman.
"This village has been plagued with Incubi," she informed, "they're everywhere."
"Aren't you afraid one might come after you," you asked with a smirk. To your surprise the girl shakes her head.
"No, actually I want to meet on, apparently they're really good looking," she replied. You couldn't believe her, she was either really brave or really stupid, these weren't some kind of animal that only attack when they feel threatened, these were demons, they destroy lives for the fun of it.

After giving you a blanket to lie on the woman left to her room, after a while she was sound asleep. This was your chance, perhaps you were just overwhelmed since it was your first time, or maybe the other girl wasn't attractive enough, this girl was the perfect bait, she wanted to meet an Incubus so you would show her an Incubus, and make her regret wanting to meet one. You entered her room and looked at her sleeping form, you crept closer, changing back to your usual form, you were a meter from her bed when the hesitation struck again, you couldn't take a single step closer, you couldn't do it, you had the perfect opportunity and you couldn't rape her. You turned around and was about to leave, you stopped for a moment and turned to the blanket that lied on the ground, you grabbed a charcoal pencil and wrote a message on a piece of canvas. 'You wanted to meet and Incubus? Well it was a pleasure to make you acquaintance. -The Incubus you invited in.' Ok, that would probably scare her more than anything else but this girl didn't seem to get scared easily. Utterly defeated you returned to hell, not wanting to be further reminded of your failure. Once you reached hell though things really went to...well...hell. Lord Satan summoned you to his thrown and you were slowly walking up to it along with your best friend, he was a fellow Incubus slightly older than you. You know, people think that demons are vicious creatures who are purely evil with no positive emotions, ok, that's partially true. Demons are like that to humans, but among each other they are like any human community, the only exception is Lord Satan, he was merciless to everyone and pure evil, even among demons he was feared. If you were summoned to Lord Satan's thrown you were either going to suffer a fate worse than death or be completely erased from existence. You entered the room with your friend and he moved off to the side.
"YOU HAVE FAILED AS AN INCUBUS," Lord Satan's voice boomed over you, "YOU SPARED NOT ONE BUT TWO WOMEN." Lord Satan was even scarier in person, you're surprised you didn't wet yourself. "IF YOU CAN'T BE THE DEMON YOU ARE I'LL TURN YOU INTO THE SNIVELLING BABY YOU ARE!" Suddenly, you feel weird, the loincloth handing from your waist wraps around your butt to look like a diaper and your wings disappear, in a flash of light everything turns black. You wake up and feel groggy, your eyes soon gain focus and you realise where you are.
15422.title: The Incubus Saint

154223.content:
You're in a palace, in nothing but a diaper, speaking of the diaper, it feels weird, you get up and touch it, it's sticky, are diapers supposed to be sticky? Well not unless you...no way, you didn't use the diaper did you?
"Hold it!" you hear someone yell from behind you, you turn to see a knight walking up to you. "What are you doing out here? You aren't allowed out of your chamber until you are led out." The man grabbed you by the arm and dragged you off, you tried to resist but you were too weak, the man had a tight grip and was very sturdy, you couldn't even use any demonic powers because it seemed Lord Satan had stripped you of them. You continued to walk down the paths until you reached a room with a wooden table stacked with dark red cloths. "The man lifted you up into the air and pulled open the back of your diaper.
"Hey!" you yelp.
"I can't believe a boy your age is still using a diaper," the man scoffed. "I warned you that if you shat yourself again you'd receive ten spankings. Add that to the fifteen you get for leaving your chambers without permission and that's twenty five." Wait what? You didn't soil yourself, you only peed, you'd know if you did. The man ripped off your diaper and sure enough there was a large brown load at the back of your diaper. "Hurry up and get yourself clean!" the man yelled as he threw you into a bucket of icy cold water, you washed away the poo from your bum and got out, he grabbed you and dried you roughly with a towel before pulling you over his knee and grabbing a cane. You almost scoffed at this, you were a demon, you'd suffered more pain than a cane to the butt befo...
SMACK! you jutted forward as the first lashing came down, leaving a red mark on your skin. You yelped in pain as the next few came along, this was more painful than anything you had suffered, by the sixth lashing you were wailing with tears running down your face, it felt like an eternity, one lashing followed quickly by the next in an endless cycle, you didn't know why Lord Satan didn't make this the punishment in hell, fire and brimstone was a spa compared to the spanking he was receiving. Finally the spankings ceased and you're glowing red butt was diapered up. The man then grabbed you and dragged you away again into a seperate chamber, he threw you inside and locked the door.
"Wow, I can see your butt glowing through the diaper," you heard a voice chuckle from behind you. You turn around to see your friend perched at the end of a bed.
"What are you doing here?" You asked, your friend replies with a cheeky grin.
"I'm here to watch your misery," he informed. You frown as he laughs. "Well that's what Lord Satan thinks anyway, I'm here because all the other demons are boring," he dropped down to the floor and walked up to you, "I'm an Obsession Demon and now, my new obsession..." he leaned really close to your face, "...is you." He moved away and sat on your bed.
"Great, so not only do I have no powers and wear a diaper but now I'm going to have you following me everywhere," you complain.
"Oh, trust me, that's not all, see what else Lord Satan did to you," your friend waved his hand and a reflection of you appeared, you looked at it to see...
154223.title: A Royal Pain

1542231.content:
You look into the mirror but the person looking back at you isn't you, it's yourself from hundreds of years ago, you supposed you would be the equivalent of fourteen to humans. You took a step back in horror, this wasn't happening, you had de-aged! Why would Lord Satan do this to you? You're friend snickered slightly behind you.
"Of course you find it funny!" you snap.
"Look on the bright side," your friend replied, "at least you still have your looks, you're by far the cutest diapered fourteen-year-old I've ever met." You rolled your eyes as he gave you a toothy grin.
"Are you even sure you're allowed to have me as your obsession?" you asked, opting to change the subject quickly.
"You know how it works," your friend replies, "I'm old enough to make any human my permanent obsession."
"You're an Incubus," you remind, "you can make any female your permanent obsession. As you know I'm NOT female or human!" He pats you on the head and chuckles.
"So what? I'm a gay Incubus," your friend replied, "Lord Satan doesn't mind, being Gay is against God anyway. As for you not being human, well sorry to tell you but unless you can sprout demonic wings you are." You groaned, ok, so you didn't hate the idea of being with your friend, actually it was the only thing you were glad about, but the fact that you were now human was something your friends was going to rub into your face constantly.
"Fine, stay here if you want," you inform him, "but I swear to Satan you better not rape me."
"Are you serious?" you're friend asked, disgusted, "you'd probably shit yourself in the middle of it." You whimper slightly, realising he was probably right. You feel the front of your diaper start to warm up and look down to see the red cloth turn dark, tears well in your eyes as the diaper dampens more.
"You're right," you start to sob, "I'm nothing but a diaper using baby." You friend moves over to you and places his hand on your shoulder.
"Hey, what's wrong with that?" your friend asked, "as I said, you look cute in a diaper."
"You honestly think that?" you asked, wiping the tears from your eyes. Your friend poses for a minute before looking at you with a flirtatious smirk.
"Actually, it kind of turns me on," his informs. You push him away with a disgusted groan.
"That's gross, even by your standards," you reply, your friend shrugs.
"I can't help it if I like my men with extra padding," he joked. "But you're lucky to have me as your demon, cause I'm going to humiliate you so much you're going to be calling me daddy in no time."
"And how do you plan to do that?" you ask with a skeptical smirk. Your friend waves his finger around.
"Don't forget, demons have control over humans," he reminded, you went to talk but stopped dead in your tracks, you let out a loud fart as a large turd evacuated into your diaper, expanding it greatly.
"What did you do that for?" you ask, your face only as bright red as your hair.
"To prove my point," he smirked, "and cause I want to see how that knight will react when he sees you've soiled yourself again." At that you grabbed onto your friend desperately, tears welling up in your eyes.
"Please, no, I can't take any more spanking, you can't let him see me like this," you plead, your friend looks into your large yellow eyes and his face turns almost as red as yours. You were damned cute!
"O-ok, I'll change you before he arrives," he stutters. He brings you to the bed and lays you down, he unwraps your diaper and tossed it away before cleaning you up, after that he wrapped a new diaper around you. "Is baby all nice and clean now?" he cooed.
"Hey! get dressed, we're going to work!" a man yelled from the other side of the door.
"Looks like that's my cue," your friend informed as he retracted his wings and regressed to look your age.
"What are you doing?" you ask your friend.
"What better way to hang around than pretend to be your twin brother," he replied with a wink.
"We don't look alike," you reminded.
"It's called fraternal twins," your friend replied. "But if I'm going to be human I need a name."
"Why don't we call you Joshy?" you suggest.
"Be serious," he scolds, "I want a cool name, something mischievous."
1542231.title: Baby Demons

choices: Seth leans in and kisses you

The next day (After Seth had his 'fun')
15422312.content:
"Fine, what do you think about Seth?" you ask, your friend smirks.
"I like it," he replies. "Seth the Incubus! Has a nice ring to it don't you think." The door began to open as the knight started entering. "Oops, he would be pissed if we weren't dressed yet," Seth waved his hands as clothes appeared on the two of you. Seth was wearing a baggy white shirt with dark brown pants and a green sash around his waist. You, on the other hand, was only wearing a brown leather vest, you weren't wearing any pants. leaving your diaper exposed to the whole world, and didn't have any undershirt, you had a red sash tied around your waist.
"Come on you two," the knight ordered, "we have work to do."
"Why the hell aren't I wearing pants?" you ask as you and Seth followed the man.
"It's easier to change you if we have direct access to your diaper," Seth informed. "And how am I supposed to get turned on if I can't see that diapered butt of yours?" you roll your eyes and looked forward. The knight ordered you to shovel up poo in the stables, after supervising for a few minutes he left. You scoop up the poo and toss it into a pile, Seth on the other hand stopped working the moment the knight had left.
"Aren't you going to help?" you ask, slightly annoyed.
"This is your job, I'm just pretending," he tells you. You groan in annoyance and continue your job. After a while of shovelling shit you notice that the load is lightening quickly, you turn to see Seth using his powers to rake the poo up quicker. In no time you were finished cleaning the stable.

"Looks like we did it," you cheer, "the knight won't be back for another hour, what should we do?" You turn to Seth, who smirks at you.
"I can think of something," he walked over to you slowly, creeped out you start to back up. You reach a wall and Seth leans his hands against the wall, trapping you, you take short, quick breaths and he looks down at you with his glowing orange eyes, even though his form was fourteen like yours he made his slightly taller. He stared into your bright yellow eyes before leaning closer to you.
"Seth what are you doing?" you ask, trying to squeeze yourself against the wall.
"I'm killing some time," Seth answers, he places his foot between yours and leans closer so that your bodies touch.
"You may be gay but I'm not," you shout to him, he smiles mischievously.
"Really? that's not what that bulge at the front of your diaper says," he replies. You swallow as he leans his face closer, you couldn't deny that he was hot, naturally, he was an incubus after all, his unkempt, pitch-black hair fell over his orange eyes that seemed to radiate the heat and light of a real fire. Seth moves his hands to your side, squeezing you slightly, you could feel his body temperature, he was hot, so were you for that matter, you didn't want to admit the fact they you were enjoying this, but you couldn't control that handy indicator in your diaper.
"Seth...please," you pleaded, blushing as tears pricked the corners of your eyes.
"Shh," Seth replied, moving hands up from your sides and to your chest, "let me have my fun."
15422312.title: Seth, The Gay Incubus

154223121.content:
Seth brushes the hair from your face as he leans onto you, pressing his lips against yours. Instinctively, you wrap your arms around Seth and pull him closer, the moment continued, seemingly never to stop, eventually he pulls away for the kiss and smirks. You remain there dazed for a moment, a mixture of confused, excited and frustrated over what had happened.
"My my, someone's a naughty boy," Seth teases as the boner was clear in your diaper. You shake yourself from the daze and grow red with anger and embarrassment.
"What did you do that for!" you shout.
"Don't lie, you liked that," he smiles, you huff and turn from him. You spend the rest of the time alone not talking to him, eventually the knight returns and sends you back to your cabin for dinner and bed. You lie down in your bed with your back facing Seth. "Are you seriously giving the silent treatment?" Seth asks.
"You violated me," you reply, Seth sighs.
"Admit it though, you like boys," Seth declares, there is a moment of silence before you nod your head, face red with embarrassment. Seth, seeming contempt with your answer sits down on the bed.
"What are you doing?" you ask.
"There's only one bed in here," Seth informs, "we both need to sleep on it." You reluctantly slide over and allow Seth to lie next to you, his body heat warming you up.

The next morning you wake up to find Seth's body pressed against yours with his arms wrapped around you. You try to move but accidentally wake him up.
"Morning," he greets groggily. He sits up and looks over to you, "how is my baby demon?"
"Don't start!" you snap. Seth frowns.
"A little cranky this morning," he pouts, "did someone have an accident last night?" he coos, looking down at your obviously soiled diaper.
"Shut up!" you huff.
"Fine," he replies, "I'll just let the guard change you."
"No please!" you plead, "please change me," Seth smirks as you plead with him, he leans down and kissed you on the forehead.
"Of course," he smiles. You lay down and he unwraps your diaper, gagging dramatically as he pulls it away from you. He cleans you up before wrapping a new diaper around you.
"Get dressed!" the knight shouted from the other side of the door. Seth clicked his fingers and yo were both clothed in the same clothes as the day before. The duo followed the knight and found themselves in a room littered with coal. "You two need to shovel all this coal into that furnace," the knight informed, "you aren't leaving until it gets done!" With that he slammed the door and walked away. You sighed and grabbed a shovel, you started to shovel coal into the furnace as Seth used his powers to make the shovel pick up the coal buy itself.
"You can't seriously still be made at me can you?" Seth asked. You remained silent and continued shovelling coal. Come on, it was just a kiss, you enjoyed it just as much as I did. While he was right you simply ignored him, he shouldn't have kissed you without your permission, even if it was only a kiss. Seth seemed very sad as he walks behind you. "You admitted you liked guys last night, there's no need to hide the fact that you're attracted to me," he whispers into your ear, causing you to freeze and your hairs to stand up. Seth places one hand on your shoulder while the other rests on your lower back. "And besides, Incubi have the best sex," Seth lowers his hand into the front of your diaper. You try to pull away from Seth once you feel his hand in your diaper.

choices: Kris's friend began raising it's voice while at home more.
Kris's friend began raising it's voice while at daycare more.
15432.content:
"I don't think anything happened at daycare. I don't think anything happened with his friends, or either of us. Hasn't really complained about new foods, or clothes, or anything like that. Nothing's really changed at home--Oh that's right, the new home. Do you think we moved too quickly, and that shook something up?"

"I don't think so. He was really excited about it for a long time, and I don't hear him complaining about the new house or being afraid of it, or whatever. I really thought he liked it at first, but maybe that's what it is? I just don't know."

The man and woman sitting at the kitchen table turned to an older man resting by the counter. The gentleman kept his lips pursed before rolling his eyes out of their view, looking out into the old house's living room and seeing a young boy crossing his arms looking at the television set.

"Well, it could be that." The older man said. "I er, didn't think he'd feel that way either, but, hmm..." He trailed off, nodding to himself. "Nah, it's nothing." The lady looked up at him. "What?" She asked, looking back to the living room. The older man took a breath. "Nothin'. You know me n' your mom lived here for close to thirteen years and we never had any problems. But..." he trailed off again. "But what?" The younger adult asked. The older man cleared his throat. "We don't know who came 'afore that, but...Hey, that stuff doesn't matter, right? You didn't see nothin' about who came 'fore us, right?" He looked to the other two with a tinge of concern. The lady sighed. "No. We're pretty sure we only saw your guys' stuff on the way in." She remarked. The man looked up suddenly. "Oh, but we could never get in the basement. Did you leave something behind in there?" He turned to the older gentleman, who was fixing his collar. "Ah, heh, heh. No, we never got in there either. I uh, don't think there's anything important down there anyway, just a storm cellar. And there ain't no storms around here, anyway." He nodded to them reassuringly. "Kind of a pretty paintin' on the doors though, hm?" He nodded again, "Yeah, it was kinda nice. Couldn't read the stuff in the circle around it, though." The man looked to the woman. "Did you see it?" He asked, the lady looking up from her coffee. "I did, but I have no idea what that's about..."

The young man sat cross-legged in the living room, continuing to watch TV. He'd been listening to various cartoons and children's shows that were playing, though he also had been hearing a voice that weren't his parents, nor his grandparents, nor any of his friends every now and then. It was a playful voice who'd pipe down most of the time, but other times would alert him when it felt like he didn't want the toddler to do something. Something rather specific, and this little voice was beginning to tug at his attention as he sat in front of the TV. His imaginary friend of sorts laid on it's stomach beside him, unable to be seen or heard by anyone else nearby.

"Hey, Kris! You look like you have to go wee-wee." the voice said in a playful tone as the boy began wobbling in place, trying not to keep his hands in his lap for too long. "Yeeah..." He thought back to his friend, his knees beginning to tremble as the cartoons played on the TV. The voice giggled. "Well watch out, they're gonna make you go you-know-where if you keep movin' like that! Why don't you just do it right now? You'll feel a lot better." The voice chimed in a convincing, airy tone. Kris tried sitting up straight. "Nuh-uh, I wanna take a break and go potty. I don't wanna change...." He hopped in place. The figure with the voice rolled over and spoke again. "Aw c'mon, changes aren't so bad. See, you really wanna just do it, don't you?" The voice whispered as Kris as he undid his sitting position, re-doing it several times. "Mmph..." He let out a small whine, prompting his parents in the kitchen to look over, right as the figure with the voice rolled over into Kris, disappearing as Kris gained a sudden, stern expression.

"Oh, Kris, why don't we go potty? See, the commercials are coming on..." His mother stood up and walked into the room. Kris suddenly folded his arms. "N-no!" He said, squirming in place as he sat criss-crossed. His mother glanced back into the kitchen, then back to the living room. "Come on, Kris. It'll only take a minute, you look like you really have to go potty--" She stopped for a moment as Kris interrupted her with a sudden whine. "Nnnooo!" He said as she got closer, only delaying her progress slightly. She folded her arms. "Alright Kris, does that mean you're going to have an accident in your pants again?" She inquired, trying not to agitate him further. Kris heard a playful laugh as he began to grin. "Yeah!" He said with a near-jubilant tone, though he felt as though it wasn't really him who said it, despite clearly being his voice. His mother moved forward. "Oh, come now. You're not even watching the TV, you--" She took him by the elbow and took a deep breath, sighing at the carpet beneath him. "Ohh. Darn."

-

After getting changed Kris laid on the sofa in his new pullups and new stretchy pants, mismatching with his shirt. The voice could be heard above him, on the arm rest, an ambiguous figure draped over it holding what semblance of a bizarre head it had in it's hands. "Hehe! Wasn't that fun, Kris?" He asked, to which Kris glanced in another direction. "N-no..." He thought. The figure blew a raspberry at him. "Of course it was! You don't need the potty, you can just do it when you want! I think your mom and dad are just being mean to you." Kris sighed. "N-nuh uh. I don't think so..." He thought back, hesitantly. "Yeah, well I think so!" The figure fired back. "C'mon, I'm gonna show you how to have all the fun you want. And it doesn't gotta do with anything about the potty!" It said, popping back out as Kris rolled over to watch more TV.

The days seemed as though there were similar situations as this day's from about two weeks prior, and only continued. Kris, his parents and his grandfather tried getting along the best they could when it was time for the potty, but it always seemed to be a challenge due to a certain imaginary friend Kris had met, just two weeks prior when the notorious basement doors opened up for him without so much as a creak. From that point on, the road to being a big kid got a little more confusing...

What sort of challenges did Kris and his family have to deal with after that day?
15432.title: A toddler-nothing quite like forcing tantrums o...

choices: "...we've only just started, and yet he's made so little progress."
"...this regression is strange considering how well he's been doing."
154321.content:
Not every accident was the fault of the 'friend'.

-------------------------

"Good morning, Kris!" Said his mother, pulling the sheets back from his bed. Kris rubbed his eyes as he woke up for the morning.

"Morning, Mommy..." Kris sat up and swung his legs over the side of the bed, standing up in his PJs. Mommy pulled his PJ pants down and revealed a wet diaper.

"Alright, Mr. Big Pants, let's get you into your big boy Pull-Ups for the day!" She said, swinging him onto the changing mat and unfastening the tapes of the diaper. The shadowy figure merely watched. He had no hand in his accident-he could not influence the boy while he was asleep.

--------------------------

Other accidents were more subtle.

--------------------------

Kris wriggled in the back seat of the car, on the way to the park. He had to pee.

The shadowy friend stood on the floor, between him and the seat to his right.

“You can’t go potty now. You’re in the car! There’s no potty close!”

And so, Kris let it out. Dad felt the wet Pull-Up as he picked him up.

“Awww, Kris, why didn’t you say you had to go?”

“No potty,” Kris said.

----------------------------

And sometimes, it got obvious.

----------------------------

Kris was playing in the backyard when he had to poop.

“Kris, do you have to go?” asked his friend.

“I gonna make a boom boom.” Kris nodded.

“How about we make a poopy in your Pull-Up?” The friend asked. “You wouldn’t have to stop playing and having fun!”

Kris felt a little odd about this. The black figure walked into him, and the doubt was gone. He squatted, fidgeting with the truck in front of him as he let out his poop into his Pull-Up.

--------------------------------

“I’m concerned about his behavior. I know some kids have trouble going potty, but…”

1543212.content:
“This regression is strange considering how well Kris was doing. This isn’t like him.” A gentle sip of coffee, with her throat eventually cleared, Lorraine rubbed her eyes. “I’m completely lost. What am I supposed to do?”

A dismissive huff came from the other side of the kitchen, “He’s a young’un. All young’uns need their time to figure things out, and when he figures it out, he’ll be right as rain in a few weeks.”

“The pull-ups were to incentivise him, Dad.” Lorraine replied with a frustrated groan. “Before we moved, he was going on the potty without a single problem and now all of a sudden he’s back to wearing diapers in bed.”

“He’s a young’un,” The same response came. “You weren’t a spring chicken when you were a toddler.”

“But I didn’t fall back into diapers, daddy.” She raised herself from her kitchen seat and groaned in fustration, pacing back and forth. “I didn’t step back into diapers after just giving up walking over to the training potty that’s in the same darn room — in PLAIN sight.”

Saxon grumbled, “Kids all go through phases. I’m not a therapist or somethin’ professional an’ the like but that’s just plain sight. He’s just a normal kid who’s a little late to potty training.”

—

The collection of plastic trucks collided with one-another perfectly which brought a sincere smile to Kris’ face. He giggled, and reveled in his playtime as a small plastic fire truck smacked against his yellow pick-up truck in an uncoordinated playful crash by hand.

He lost track of time — intensely focused on his bright colourful toy cars, only to be bombarded with a sudden twinge in his lower stomach. His focus soon drifted and his eyes soon landed on the nearby bright blue training potty, only for him to pause as his ears soon caught a hushed whisper.

“What’s the matter, Kris?”

He didn’t respond, only pausing to sit upright and let his pull-ups act as a makeshift seat.

“Kris?”

“Go away.” Kris mumbled, his lips scrunched together. “I don’t wanna go potty anymore.”

“Oh, Kris. Kris. Kris...” The whispers continued, “You’re wearing a pull-up. If you’ve got to go potty, then why don’t you use that? Isn’t it so much better?”

He shook his head, “Nuh-uh. Dun’ wanna potty anymore. Dun’ wanna potty in my pull-ups or in any other potty.”

“Why is that?” The voice belonging to Kris’ friend had suddenly transformed from a hushed whisper to a comforting lull, his attention was brought to the fact it sounded remarkably similar to Mommy’s soothing voice.

“Mommy’s upset cus’ I don’t use the big boy potty.” Kris explained, his fingers soon fiddled with the top band of his pull-up. “Dun’ wanna potty in anything ever again so Mommy won’t be sad.”

“That’s silly!” Kris’ friend began, “We’re bestest friends. And friends make sure they’re happy together. I don’t like it when you’re sad, Kris.”

“Dun’ wanna make Mommy sad.” Kris repeated, his eyes soon lowered.

“You should be playing with your toys!” The voice’s soothing tone had turned jovial, “You should be playing! You like your toys, don’t you?”

“Nuh-uh.” Kris frowned, his legs fidgeted as the pressure in his bladder began to build. “I dun’ wanna play anymore. I gotta go potty, but I dun’ wanna anymore.”

It became harder for Kris to ignore the thoughts of going potty. His hand had subconsciously drifted toward his crotch, pressing against his pull-up, suddenly starting to worry about what was about to happen.

“You like the big truck because it crashes into the other trucks, right?”

“Uh-huh.” Kris nodded, “I like it a lot.”

“Show me! I’ve never seen the big truck crash into the small trucks before!”

He couldn’t understand at first, despite the feeling in his bladder, his simple excitement for the trucks, and the golden opportunity to show his best friend how good the trucks were had threw his worries aside. Kris smiled, soon crawling over to his red fire truck and smashing it against his other yellow truck.

Laughter ensued, both Kris and his friend laughed at the infantile display of playtime and thoroughly enjoyed themselves. For a split second, Kris suddenly froze, his pull-up became soggier by the second. He sighed in relief, knowing his worries for going potty had magically disappeared.

“Yay! You did it!”

The sense of relief washing over Kris was perfect. He rested, only to squish his wet pull-up against the floor, and momentarily inserted his thumb into his mouth to suckle on.

“See? That’s why the pull-ups are there! You don’t have to think about going potty, because the pull-up does everything for you!”

It finally came to Kris, fully smiling at his soaked pull-up, “Oh, I get it now!”

Laughter ensued.
1543212.title: This regression is strange considering...

choices: The timer goes off, and he hasn't gone yet.
He goes potty before the timer goes off.
15432121.content:
Lorraine sighed. "Honey, do you know anything that could help with this?"

Bruno, Kris's father, thought for a moment. "A few things, but one sticks out for the moment. We could try putting him on the potty every couple of minutes, which would prevent some accidents. It's a band-aid solution at best, but it should help him get back into the rhythm."

Saxon nodded at that. "I can see that workin'. What else ya' got?"

Bruno pulled out a cell phone. "Not much. I'll talk to my sister, she has a boy named Ryan, who went through potty training two years ago, and maybe she'll have some tips."

Saxon grunted. "Maybe it's time for Grandpa Saxon to show him a thing 'er two about the potty." He stood up from the stool, but Lorraine shook her head.

"Maybe after today, but right now, this needs a mother's touch. We need to be soft and gentle and kind, show him that the potty isn't an enemy."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------

Kris frowns as he is sat on the training potty.

"Don't hafta go."

Lorraine smiles. "C' mon, Kris. Didn't you used to want to be a big boy and wear big boy undies?" To prove her point, she holds up a pair of children's underwear that has designs on them-Bob the Builder, to be specific.

Kris looks a little tempted, but then shakes his head and frowns. "Don't wanna." Lorraine frowns.

"We're staying on this potty until you go, or that timer goes off."
15432121.title: Later that day, Kris is placed on the training ...

choices: It’s Grandpa Saxon’s turn to try and train Kris.
Lorraine goes back to the drawing board and rethinks her plans.
Kris’ friend speaks to him once more.
154321212.content:
The timer was set for five minutes. Three had passed; leaving both Kris and Lorraine to idly sit in the middle of the bathroom with several awkward glances directed at one-another. Kris idly kicked his legs between the training potty’s seat, fiddling with the bottom of his t-shirt, he suddenly felt the need to relieve himself.

“Two minutes,” Lorraine hummed, she dipped her smartphone back into her pocket and glanced at her son. “Two minutes. Got anything y’wanna do in the potty, son?”

“Dun’ gotta potty, Mommy.” Kris huffed. His body language, however, seemed to tell a different story. He uncomfortably shuffled back and forth on the edge of the training potty, giving way for his bottom lip to quiver in plain sight.

“Y’sure?”

“Dun’ wanna, dun’ wanna!” Kris finally yelped, his legs wildly kicked before he attempted to stand up. “Dun’ wanna potty at all! Wanna play trucks!”

“Settle down, Kris.” Lorraine responded with a firm grasp on her son’s shoulders. She gently rested him back down onto the training potty and sighed, “Y’get to play with trucks in a few minutes. Go tinkle in the potty and you can play as long as y’like.”

“Nuh-uh,” Kris frowned, the fustration on the toddler’s face became apparent. “Dun’ wanna. Wun’ trucks.”

“You can’t, son.” Lorraine replied, “Just go tinkle in the potty and y’get to play with as many trucks as y’like..”

The fustration was too much for Kris to bare. He stood — again defying his mother, and quickly dashed over to the open bathroom door. His little legs carried him to the door and left the bathroom.

“Whoa nelly,” Lorraine gasped, she quickly stood on her feet and stepped outside of the bathroom. “Where’d that jaybird go?”

It was obvious, and Lorraine heard her son rustling and moving in his bedroom. She took a few steps into Kris’ bedroom and noticed her son surrounded by his familiar collection of toy trucks, smiling at the sight of his toys.

“Oh, Kris.” Lorraine huffed, “You’re one slippery eel, mister. Come back and go on the potty before you make a whoopsie on the carpet.”

Kris didn’t seem to listen to his mother’s words. He slammed two trucks against each other, giggling and laughing, before finally noticing his mother standing in the doorway.

“Come on, mister.” Lorraine playfully drawled, “Gotta get back on the potty before—“

And suddenly, Kris had begun to relieve himself and create a puddle where he sat. The toddler briefly paused his playtime before resuming with his toys — much to the grief of his frustrated mother. “Oh, come on!”

Lorraine sighed, pulling her smartphone from her pocket and checking the timer in defeat.

“Thirty seconds left... dang it.”

Unbeknownst to Lorraine, the laughter from Kris wasn’t directed toward his knowingly naughty behaviour. It was towards her.
154321212.title: He goes potty before the timer goes off.

1543212122.content:
After putting Kris down for his nap, Lorraine sighed as she entered the living room.

"I tried it, but he ran away at the last minute and peed all over the floor." Bruno and Saxon look at her, very sympathetic and confused.

"Wow. That is a new level of 'didn't see that coming'." Bruno added, occasionally looking at his phone.

Saxon stood up. "I think it's time we go old-school. No fancy Pull-Ups or potties, just me, him, underwear, and the toilet."

Lorraine shakes her head. "No, dad. I think we could use a touch of that, though. Maybe going cold turkey could be good for him."

Bruno stands up. "My sister finally replied. She said that maybe we could have Kris's cousin, Blake, come in, try and act as a role model. She said role models are good-same gender as the kid, acts as a way for them to see what being a big kid is all about. I could help with that, and maybe some of the neighbors, or his friends from the park?"

Lorraine nods at that.

"I've been reading some books, and one of the options says that if it's not going anywhere, then maybe going back to diapers can be good. Sometimes, a kid just needs a break. Maybe he's frustrated or overwhelmed and wants to relax."

The debate rages between Saxon's, Lorraine's, and Bruno's ideas, but eventually, they agree on it.

15432121221.content:
Lorraine sighed as she got up and out of bed the next morning. It had been decided to go through with ol' Saxon's plan of going cold turkey, straight to undies, or commando if need be. "If the lad really feels the mess, and don't got no damned absorbtion, then that will make him see it ain't good to use his pants as a toilet." he had said, and even she had to admit, he had a point. She'd known a few kids throughout her life trained through similar methods, such as with Elimination Communication. Saxon had headed off for a fishing trip with some old war pals of his. Meanwhile, Bruno had headed off on a business trip, leaving Lorraine with little Kris for the next week or two.

As she goes into his room, having already switched out his Pull-Ups in his drawer with undies of all types, she thought of when to get him into his first pair. Holding said pair in her grasp, she decided to put him in undies....
15432121221.title: Off comes the Pull-Ups, on comes the undies. (S...

Kris' fear gets to him, and he searches for some pull-ups
Kris suddenly realized Lorraine was calling him for breakfast
154321212212.content:
Kris wasn't as fussy as Lorraine originally expected him to be. His usual complaints and defiant cries against wearing his 'big boy' underwear seemed to be missing -- with a sense of obediency as he was switched from yet another wet pair of pull-ups and into his normal underwear. She couldn't tell if Kris had his mind elsewhere despite wanting to protest his random distaste of big boy underwear; or whether he really didn't seem to care.

"Ain't that cute, now?" Lorraine hummed, she pulled Kris' underwear up to his waist and gave a reassuring smile. "Look at those big boy underwear, mhh-hhm. Looking pretty smart, and might I say, grown up."

The initial encouragement from Lorraine didn't seem to bother Kris. His sudden opt for being quiet left her with a sense of unease; as if something bad were to happen, and she wasn't going to be able to stop it despite the comforting lull in her voice. She took her son's light brown shorts and pulled them to his waist and buttoned them together, still smiling.

"Why do I gotta wear my big boy underwear?" Kris asked, seemingly confused at the sudden change in undergarments.

"Well," Lorraine paused, clicking the roof of her mouth with her tongue. "We've been trying so hard to make you get to the training potty. It's time for something a little different that'll show y'can't use pull-ups for everything."

"But," Kris paused, he blinked, attempting to think what to say next. "What if I gotta to pee?"

"Without your pull-ups?" Lorraine responded, "You'll have to run to the training potty. I'll leave it in the living room, okay? If you have an accident, it's gonna feel so icky and bad."

"I dun' wanna feel icky and bad," Kris' eyes widened, "I dun' feel icky when I wear pull-ups."

"It's gonna be rough, kiddo." Lorraine brushed her finger's against her son's hair, "It's all apart'a growing up. You'll be so smart, an' grown-up when you make it to the potty."

It took a moment for the words to sink in for Kris. He stood; somewhat conflicted over his Mother's message, before finally nodding. The apparent worry in his eyes didn't do Lorraine any favours, "Gonna be tough, kiddo. But I know you'll sit on that plastic potty and act like a grown-up in no time."

The conversation soon ended with very little to add on; leaving Kris to enjoy his toys and an occasional glance at the TV which was showing several cartoons. The awkwardness of not wearing his thick pull-ups was starting to sink in -- like something was missing, but he couldn't figure out what entirely. His big boy underwear was too thin for him to notice or protect him if an accident were to happen. His thoughts soon turned to his Mother and the subsequent praise he received for going along with her plan filled him with a sense of confidence.

It was only a few moments later; that something still felt off, and Kris couldn't quite place his finger on it.

1543212122123.content:
"Kris! It's time for breakfast." Lorraine calls.

Kris waddles over and looks at the breakfast. Looks like one of his favorites: Pancakes with fruit and milk. Kris smiles as he begins to eat up.

"So, are you ready to be a big boy and use the potty today?" Lorraine mentions casually as she eats her own breakfast.

Kris, a little confused, shrugs. "Idunno." He says.

"Well, why don't we try making an effort. No more timers for sitting on the potty, but a timer for visiting it. We'll visit every thirty minutes. Or, maybe we can just go before and after every activity. Once we finish eating, we go potty. Then we play, then we go potty. Then we nap, then we go potty. Or, you could try being a big boy like Daddy and Grandpa and telling me when you have to go."

Lorraine wasn't just idly giving suggestions. She had read: When toddlers feel overwhelmed and want to be in control, give them a limited number of choices.

Kris didn't immediately reply, but once he did, he affirmed which plan he liked the most. Or, did he?
1543212122123.title: Kris suddenly realized Lorraine was calling him...

Kris runs to the potty all by himself and receives praise from Lorraine.
Kris begins crying as he messes his pants.
15432121221232.content:
A few minutes into breakfast and a decision was made. The serving of pancakes and fruit was enough to ebb Kris into making a decision -- with seemingly few morsels left to eat; he politely nodded and swallowed his food, "That one."

"Which one, hun?" Lorrarine asked, she too, also wrapped up on her own breakfast of bacon and toast. "Going potty every thirty minutes?"

"Nuh-uh."

"Telling me when y'gotta go?"

"Nuh-uh."

"Sitting on the potty after doing something?" A smile finally grew on Lorraine's lips. "I can work with that. Finish your pancakes, and we'll get started."

---

The morning went slow, even for Kris' standards, as once breakfast ended he found himself being taken upstairs into Lorraine's bedroom. A collection of cardboard boxes, picture frames and sets of old items were neatly spaced out in the middle of the bedroom. He yearned for his toys, but his Mommy's work appeared to be more important -- save for his mission to settle on the potty.

"Got some unpacking to do, Kris." Lorraine began, "There's a lot of work involved; but it's gonna be worth it."

"What do I do?" Kris replied, his uneveness towards the stacks of cardboard boxes left him a little overwhelmed. His feet shuffled across the carpet, "Do I gotta work too?"

"A little work's good for the soul." Lorraine nodded, "Do a little stuff; and then straight to the potty, that make sense?"

A nearby cardboard was hoisted over; with Lorrarine gently resting it in-front of her son, she ripped at the tape and opened the box to reveal a collection of brightly coloured toys inside. Kris felt his jaw drop. His eyes widened at the sight of the toys; some of which he hadn't seen in a while since moving house.

"Lotta toys!" Kris happily cooed, his small frame immediately bounced on the spot. Lorraine laughed.

"Look at those toys, uh-huh? Tell ya' what. Why don't you take the toys outta the box and put them in your bedroom?"

"I can do that!" Kris chirped, smiling.

"Good! You're doing such a big-boy job! Once they're in your bedroom y'can play with them after we're done here." Loarrine explained, but Kris wasn't listening in the slightest. He dipped in, and retreived several coloured blocks which brought an even bigger smile on face. A few of the toys were hastily shoved into his hands, and left Kris to quickly toddle outside Lorraine's bedroom and transport them into his own.

He entered his room; still smiling, and deposited several of the toys into the corner of his existing toy pile. His satisfaction for the growing pile motivated him further. He turned -- but suddenly noticed his bedroom door had quietly shut itself. Ignoring this; he toddled over to the door and reached for the handle.

"Aren't you going to play with those toys now?"

Kris stopped.

"It was so nice of Mommy to show you those toys, right?"

"Uh-huh," Kris nodded, "Lotta toys in the big box! I'm a big boy helping Mommy!"

"You don't have to do that. There's plenty of toys. Why don't you relax and enjoy yourself?" The hushed whisper soon died down; leaving Kris to shake his head and take a step back in confusion. "You're not wearing pull-ups, Kris. Why? That's so sad. You're a baby, babies are supposed to have fun. Why aren't you having fun?"

Kris found himself walking -- not completely sure where he was heading or why he was even moving to begin with, and waddled over to his drawers in a strange fit of confusion. He shook his head, again, and felt his legs feeling weaker than usual. He fell backwards, landing on his bottom with his hands clamped onto his drawers as a last-ditch effort to save his fall. Several pull-ups and night-time diapers happened to be stacked inside as his hands pulled open the drawers as he fell.

"Oh, look!" The voice playfully pointed out, "There's your pull-ups and diapers!"

"Stop it!" Kris grumbled, "Dun' wanna play. Gotta help Mommy and be a big-boy!"

For a brief moment, Kris finally found the strength to stand up and look back at his bedroom door. He walked, slowly but surely, and did all he could to ignore his friends voice. The doorknob eventually turned and Kris managed to walk out; but soon he felt something unusual enter his mind -- thoughts becoming cloudy, legs weakening and a sudden impulse to relieve himself.

Opposite Kris' bedroom; Lorraine glanced outside and noticed Kris standing in the middle of the hall. Something was different. She quickly stood up and hurried over to her son and reacts accordingly.

Lorraine...

1543212122123221.content:
An estatic buzz filled the air; leaving Lorraine absolutely giddy over Kris' achievement to control himself for even the most brief of periods. With the training potty now full, Kris toddled over to the bathroom sink and appropriately dipped his hands under the cool streams of water with a slight touch of soap. His grin couldn't get any wider.

"I did good, Mumma!" Kris chirped; his lack of proper coordination washing his hands splashed a handful of water toward him, "I went over to the potty!"

"Ain't that the truth, kiddo!" Lorraine replied, smiling. "I'm so proud. After all the setbacks -- y'finally managed to do it. I'm so darn proud right now. I wish I'da took some pictures."

The further praise sent Kris' into an energetic shuffle across from the sink; hands dripping with soapy water, took them to a nearby towel and dried his hands. "Do I gotta go potty again soon, Mumma?"

"Not yet," Lorraine slowly walked over to her son, taking the towel and proceeded to wipe Kris' hands, "Give it a while, kiddo. Y'did good. I think a little break is in order. Why don't I make some yummy sandwiches while y'play with some toys, eh? I think we deserve a break after all that hard work."

"Sandwiches?" Kris' gaped, "Cheese and buh-buh... Butter!"

"I know," Lorraine nodded, chuckling, "Just how y'like them. Go on; play in your bedroom and I'll come up with some sandwiches and juice."

Kris soon left the bathroom. His excitement for sandwiches left a visible waddle in his short run across the hall; with his hands pushing his bedroom door wide open, he soon settled down on a nearby large yellow truck and lost himself in his games. He ran his toys against the carpet -- making all sorts of unintelligable and playful sounds, with very little breaks in-between for himself.

Time passes; and Kris suddenly stops playing as he notices something in the corner of his eye. He looks up; turning round to look at his bed for a brief moment before realizing something.
1543212122123221.title: Lorraine reminds Kris to wash his hands and wipe

Lorraine enters and sees the teddy bear lying on top of Kris
15432121221232213.content:
The air grew colder as the sudden appearance of the new visitor in Kris' bedroom. He felt a small lump develop in his throat; before his eyes suddenly widened at what he was seeing. His friend -- who up until now, had finally appeared before his very eyes. A brown teddy bear sat perched on the edge of Kris' bed, emotionless, yet forever smiling with the aid of fine stitching across its mouth. Soon hopped off the edge and began slowly walking over to Kris, legs giving way to an uncoordinated waddle as parts of the teddy's body became limp. The disposable diaper wrapped around the teddy's waist did not favours for its slow walk across the bedroom.

"Oh Kris," The voice coming from inside the teddy bear sounded different to Kris. He dropped his toys in sheer amazement; but felt a slight twinge of uncertainty as the teddy bear's drooped form inched closer and closer. "Look a me! I'm a big cuddly teddy bear!"

"Teddy bear?" Kris finally spoke; his shock over the animated teddy's appearance suddenly left him with a sudden sunking feeling develop in his stomach. "I dun' have a teddy. Teddy fuh' babies!"

"Oh silly," The teddy leaned back; giggling and cooing as its hand brushed against its own stitched mouth. "You're the baby, too! Babies love teddy bears!"

"Buh, buh... Mumma said I'm a big boy. Big boy dun' have a teddy! They gotta play trucks now!" Kris shook his head, his body instictively crawled slightly back a touch. He left his toys behind and eventually backed up to his chest of drawers. "G-Go away, nasty! Dun' wanna play w'you anymore!"

"You're hurting my feelings, Kris." The teddy replied, the happy tone of voice suddenly transformed into a childish whine, "Your Mommy is bad! She's trying to ruin our friendship! You're listening to Mommy all the time and that's not fair! I wanna play, too!" the teddy stamped its foot against the carpet.

The teddy's approach soon left it to look down at Kris. It stood before him, irking it's head ajar before looking at the half-open drawer to see the packages of pull-ups and diapers inside. "I wanna make you happy, Kris! Babies are always happy! If you're a baby, then that means you'll never have to worry about big boy stuff."

In the corner of Kris' vision; the bedroom door shut itself, leaving the teddy to eventually move further forward over his body and wrap its arms around his chest. He felt the sudden comfort as the teddy's hold on his body turned into a cosy, yet confusing cuddle. The stress of seeing the teddy clamber toward him and its overall presence melted away as Kris straigtened his body and allowed himself to accept the warm cuddle.

"I don't want to scare little babies. Little babies shouldn't be scared, Kris." The happy voice returned, giggling.

154321212212323.content:
Kris's legs lock as he adopts a squatting position, letting his #2 out into his underwear. The slimy, gross feeling enters the back of his undies, and it feels uncomfortable.

Lorriane sees the whole thing, and as he starts to cry, she scoops him up.

"Hey, hey, let's get you into a clean pair of undies." Lorraine carries him to the changing mat and lays him down, taking off his soiled clothing and putting it away. The wipes came out, and his private parts were cleaned up.

Inside Kris's mind, a voice rang out.

Mom caring for you, laying on your back getting changed, not having to lift a finger... this is the life, pal. I don't know why you don't get it.

Soon, the new underwear was slid on. Kris is sat up, and Mommy says something.

15433.content:
It’s a simple, yet petty, way of administering your powers for the sake of making humans miserable. You’re not entirely amused by the more severe, gory and insane methods of punishment and misery your formless demonic brothers and sisters are capable of presenting. The smaller, more intricate, nuisances are enough to satisfy your purpose in life as a demonic being.

Your powers are interesting in and of themselves. The ability to possess a human body, young or old, allows you to open the otherwise closed book into their memories, their thoughts and their most secret of desires for the taking — all of which are happily consumed and abused for your enjoyment.

Your eyes were set on a group of young humans, one in particular, had caught your formless eyes. One of the children in question was a bed wetter. The fact of which gave you a wonderful idea — to possess the person in question and make their lives worse off than they already are.

It’s morning in the human realm. You descend upon the suburbs, looking for the one human you’ve chosen for the next week of torment. A particular house strikes your fancy, grinning, you make your way inside, phasing through the walls and looking for that little human to possess.

By looking inside the house, who do you find? And what do you learn about them as you enter their minds?
15433.title: Possessing a Bedwetter

Wait until she is back home.
154331.content:
One of the girls looks very cute and happy – something you like to change as quickly as possible.
You sneak into her body and take over for a while.
“Okay, I am Chloe, I am 8 and when I am not careful, I wet the bed often.” You look into her memories.
“Then let’s get a bit uncareful.” You smile at your reflection and start your day.
The good thing of being a kid is, that everybody tells you what to do, you only need to follow orders and don’t have to look into the possessed bodies memories too often. Very quickly you find yourself in school…
“Really? Is that the stuff humans have to learn?” You think by yourself and try to survive the school day as good as good as possible. You actually have to be careful not to be TO good and don’t make Chloe a straight A student. At some point you decide to pull back and go to the passenger seat, that is fun as well – if you watch the humans slow brain work and try to make the right decisions.

Chloe is eating lunch in school and you see her hesitating with her drinks.
“I must be careful not to drink too much right now. Mr. Miller is very strict and does not allow bathroom breaks.” She only takes a sip from her water bottle and put it back in her backpack.

You smile by yourself. Maybe you should take over for a minute and drink the whole bottle of water – maybe you can make her wet her pants during the day as well.

You decide to…

It appeared that Chloe had a weak bladder. The depths of her memories had brought up several instances of Chloe herself and her Mother discussing several ways to combat the regular episodes of ‘close-calls’ at school and ‘whoopsies’ at bedtime. You summarily take control of Chloe’s body and grab hold of the water bottle with a light-hearted grin — twisting the cap with a flick of the wrist and begun to greedily suckle on the plastic tip. With the bottle empty, you stuff it back inside Chloe’s backpack and implant an excuse, citing a strong thirst for when Chloe is handed back control.

You sit back, and enjoy as Chloe’s body already begins to feel the slightest of pressures. The school bell rings — leaving Chloe to take herself back to class as her bladder begins to twitch. You’re grinning, as Chloe is sent back to class by the ding of the school bell and takes to her seat. She crosses her legs, bottom lip quivering, proceeds to focus in class as best as she could.

Your brought to Mr. Miller’s attention as the elderly teacher enters the classroom and begins his lesson. You’re counting down the seconds before Chloe let’s her bladder go.

How far does Chloe make it before wetting herself? Or is she going to get lucky and do something she’s not normally capable of doing — holding it in?
