You grin behind her head and feel the pressure growing more and more. She will never be able to hold it for the full lesson.
She lifts her hand and starts to wiggle on her chair, desperate to pee. “Mr… Mr. Miller! Can I be excused?” She begs and presses her knees together.
You expect him to say no, but Chloe must have picked his kind day as he nods and let her go.
She jumps off her seat and starts sprints out of the door and down the hallway. The bathroom is not very far away and she is fast for her young age.
“No! She will make it!” You realize and take over her left leg. You only need a small piece of her body and only for a second. You make her slip and fall to the floor. She is sliding over the floor and stops only a meter in front of the bathroom door, but by that time her panties are becoming warm and wet. The slip had made her lose control and her full bladder emptied into her pants, creating a hug wet patch on her pants.
Sobbing she comes back to her feet. Unsure she steps from one foot to the other, her mind is racing:
“If I go back now, Mr. Miller might send me home – what is good, because I am out of the wet pants quickly. For sure everybody will laugh…
Or I go to the bathroom and try to dry the pants – but I am not sure if that works and if I take too long Mr. Miller will be furious.
If I go to the nurse, I receive a dry pants, but maybe she will put me in trainers – and I hate trainers!”

Bored from her inner monolog you decide for her and make her…
15433113.title: You become impatient and force Chloe to wet her...

choices: Chloe ‘chooses’ to have a tantrum, forcing Mrs. Cherry to choose for her.
154331133.content:
The prospect of having Chloe embarass herself in the middle of class didn’t go according to plan, however the opportunity of making things worse was still ahead as Chloe herself reluctantly flirted with the idea of visiting the school nurse. The school nurse was likely to have some spare clothing and preferably, packs of pull-ups and diapers for Chloe to wear — which will, inetivitably, make things so much worse for the poor girl knowing her distaste for anything babyish in nature.

You’re watching, curiously, as Chloe quickly waddles through the school corridors in the hope that none of her classmates or friends would see her uniform in the sodden state it now is. The nurses office happened to be in an isolated corner of the school, with a large wooden oak door adorned with a signature medical cross emblazened on the front. A few nervous knocks from Chloe and the door opens to reveal an older woman, sporting a warm, happy smile.

“Oh,” The woman tsks, expression dropping to a concerned look, “Not again, Chloe. Come inside and we’ll replace those soggy undies in no time.”

The woman seemed to know of Chloe’s weak bladder, implying this isn’t the first time something like this had happened in school. A chance to spend more time prying into Chloe’s memories to get the full picture would suffice — but at a later point in time.

“I don’t know what came over me.” Chloe responded, sniffiling, she closed the door behind her and uncomfortably stood in the middle of the office. “I was thirsty all of a sudden, so I drank my entire water bottle and then... and then I needed to pee badly and then... and then—“

“—You didn’t make it in time.” The nurse finished.

“Yes, Mrs. Cherry.”

“We’ve had this discussion plenty of times, Chloe.” Mrs. Cherry took a few idle steps forward, eventually kneeling down to Chloe’s eye-level and offering a gentle smile. “Too many liquids. You were a little irresponsible with your water bottle and look what’s happened.”

“I’m a big girl,” Chloe huffed, lips trembling under the sudden soreness of her wet trousers. “I didn’t mean to. I was really thirsty.”

“I know,” Mrs. Cherry nodded, “And like a big girl, you’ve done the right thing and come straight to me. Good work.” She offered Chloe a gentle pat on the head, running her fingers through the child’s hair.

“D-Does this mean I have to—“

“I’m afraid it does.” Mrs. Cherry nodded, “You’ll have to get undressed privately in that little corner over there.” She gestured toward a small corner of the office, complete with a thick curtain and a disposable towel.

“Does t-this also mean I have t-to—“

“Let’s get you cleaned up before we think of anything else.”

And conveniently, you’ll be doing the thinking for Chloe when the right opportunity comes and shows itself. Mrs. Cherry seemed to be quite supportive of Chloe’s condition, how sweet, the child had someone in the school to comfort them in their time of need. You watch, as Chloe pulls the curtain to and begins to undress herself and expose the rest of her soaked clothing — leaving only her school shirt untouched.

Mrs. Cherry eventually returns, still smiling, and pokes her head through the curtain, “There’s several options. We’ve got plenty of spare clothing for you to wear and I’ll put your wet clothes in the washer. I know this is embarrassing for you, but there’s no spare trousers so you’ll have to wear a skirt instead.”

This news seemed to sour Chloe’s mood even further. “A skirt...?”

“That’s not the only thing.” Mrs. Cherry added, her expression seemed to imply what was coming next.

“I’m a big girl.” Chloe stated plainly, “I don’t wanna wear diapers. I don’t wanna wear diapers with a skirt, too!”

“You’ve got to choose something. You can’t walk around school with a skirt and no underwear, that’s silly. These are the rules your Mommy and Daddy set up with the school.” Mrs. Cherry let herself in further past the curtain, opening a nearby cabinet to reveal several packs of diapers from inside.

You look onward, for Chloe’s sake, and scan the pack of diapers and pull-ups and think of what to do next. Do you make Chloe ‘choose’ the pull-ups? Or the diapers? Or how about making the situation tougher for both of them?
154331133.title: Go to the school nurse

1543311333.content:
After Chloe got away very lightly after she peed herself in the hallway you decide that you want to make sure her luck ends here and now. At first you try to fuel her anger, but Chloe is respecting the nurse too much to do more than to sulk and make a grumpy face.
“Looks like I have to do everything myself.” You think by yourself and take her body over, pushing her on the passenger seat.
You stomp your feet on the ground and grab the skirt and a diaper, but only to throw them on the ground and kick them away.
“Chloe! What has gotten into you?” Mrs. Cherry scolds you and pick both pieces up again.
The kind woman is keeping her temper under control. She put the items down and shows you the pull-up.
“See, those are the most mature one we have. They are plain white and look like underwear. Nobody will notice it.”
Stubborn you take the pull-up and throw it on the ground as well.
“NO DIAPERS! NO PULL UPS! NO SKIRT! NO NO NO!!!” You shout out and run to the exit of the nurses office.
You can feel Chloe trying to stop you, but with a smile you grab the door handle and turn until Mrs. Cherry grabs your from behind and lifts you up.
“Oh no little lady, you will not run around with your naked behind on display, not to speak about your other parts.” She scolds you. Finally, she is angry at the little girl, carries you to the changing table and lay you down.
Just to make sure the nurse does not calm down too soon you kick with your legs and try to jump off the table, shouting out: “NO NO NO! I don’t want to!”

Mrs. Cherry sighs and holds you down with one hand, while she pulls a strap over your chest to bind you in place.
To be honest, you have not expected that and before you can think about a way to escape Mrs. Cherry is holding your ankles in one hand and slide a diaper under your behind.
“This is not what I had in mind, but your behavior is unacceptable. I would have liked to see you in pull-ups, but I fear you take them off as soon as I turn my back to you.”

You hide a grin. “Finally, the little girl is put in place.” You think and let the nurse diaper you obediently. As soon as the diaper is tapes close and you feel the heavy padding push your legs apart you reach for the tapes and try to pull them open again.
“I still can take the stupid thing off, I am a big girl!!” You say.
Mrs. Cherry pulls your hands away and shakes her head.
“Chloe stop it! You don’t want me to take additional measurements.”

“Ah, this is so much fun.” You say to yourself and think about the next steps. Maybe you should let Chloe take over again and see if she can save the situation somehow.
Or you press on and see what the nurse can do to stop your from taking the diaper off.
Or you do something different.

Mrs. Cherry dresses Chloe in uniform and gets her back to class
Chloe wants to go home, having enough of school and her accidents
15433113331.content:
You’re satisfied — for now, atleast. You’ve set Chloe down a miserable path, initially put her back in diapers, and slightly shook the close relationship between herself and the school nurse. You decide to allow Chloe to regain control of her body, implanting a suggestion — making her regret her sudden tantrum, yet still, hating the idea of having to wear protection on school grounds.

The waterworks begin, with Chloe bawling her eyes, tugging at her school shirt and attempting to cover up her diaper from the school nurse.

“I don’t want to wear diapers! I don’t need diapers, Mrs Cherry! Please! I’m a big girl, t-this was just an accident.” Chloe struggled to talk, her head slowly buried into the changing table’s pillow. “I didn’t mean it! I’m s-sorry!”

A warm comforting hand soon brushed through Chloe’s hair, “Everything will be fine. You’re upset. Don’t worry, I understand. I understand. You’re frustrated about the diapers, no one’s going to notice them.”

The comforting hand eventually calmed Chloe’s tantrum. Mrs. Cherry had leaned forward and pulled the child into a soft hug, ignoring the obvious crinkling coming from the diaper, and looked into the child’s eyes.

“I didn’t mean to be angry.” Chloe repeated, “I didn’t mean to try and run away.”

A smile formed across Mrs. Cherry’s lips, “Trying to run away like a little jay bird? How silly would that have been? All the boys would’ve seen your nakie butt.”

While Chloe found the conversation babyish, she found herself giggling, lightening the mood immensely.

“Let’s get your new skirt on.” Mrs. Cherry cooed, “The sooner you get back to class, the better.”

You weren’t particularly fond of the more endearing moments. The bonding between Chloe and Mrs. Cherry hadn’t been exactly what you were expecting, with the nurse suddenly taking advantage of the bad situation, and flipping it to make Chloe feel better about her situation.

Instead, you’ll let things play out their natural course. And for once — let Chloe decide on what to do.
15433113331.title: Let Chloe take over

154331133312.content:
Mrs. Cherry fastens the skirt around Chloe’s hips and makes sure it covers the waistline and the bottom. Actually, the skirt ends only two inches above her knees, therefore she should run around and her skirt would never fly high enough to show off her new padding.
“Thank you, Mrs. Cherry.” Chloe says and hugs the nurse a last time.
Your demonic mind hates this. It is sickly sweet and you hope for an embarrassing moment for the young girl, maybe when she meets her friends.
The bell rings and indicated the beginning of the last break of the day. Chloe opens the door and freeze, when she sees some girls off her class passing the pen door and stop when they see her.
“H… Hi… I… “. Chloe stutters, but the Mrs. Cherry saves her.
“Oh Chloe, I understand when you don’t want to say who ruined your pants, but if it happens again you MUST tell me, okay?!”

Chloe turns around and a sigh of relieve escapes her lips. “Yes, Mrs. Cherry. I will do that, and thank you for the skirt it is very… mature.”

“Only the best for a little lady. Have a good day!” Mrs. Cherry says and close the door.
Chloe joins her friends and even earns some compliments for her skirt. Nobody notices her diaper and you get a bit angry. Before the break ends you make her drink more water and enjoy the shock of her, when she sees the empty bottle in her hand.
“Wow, I haven’t notices that I was drinking at all.” She whispers to herself.
Unfortunately, she makes through the last class without an accident and even in the bus ride home she stays dry – even when she feels the growing need to go.

On the last meters to her house she slows down, not sure what she should say to her parents. Will they be angry that she had an accident and comes home in a diaper?
Maybe you should sit back and hope that they are angry – or – you make her wet her diaper to make her situation even worse – or – hide the diaper at a very obvious place, like her backpack and wait until her parents find it.
154331133312.title: Mrs. Cherry dresses Chloe in uniform and gets h...

choices: Chloe ‘decides’ to leave Lucas by himself
Chloe’s Mother interrupts and brings fresh clothes.
1543311333121.content:
A swift opening of the front door and a intentionally quiet entrance inside the hallway, and Chloe removed her school shoes and laid her bag by the front door. She inhaled, only to exude a drawn out sigh at the sound of activity within the kitchen — Mom and Lucas were home. She slowly walked towards the kitchen, carefully taking precise steps to minimise the crinkling noise under her borrowed skirt and entered the kitchen.

The sight of her baby brother, Lucas, fussing and restlessly thrashing from side to side in his highchair made Chloe frown. Her baby brother had a long way to go before reaching the initial stages of potty training, making Chloe herself flare with the slightest bouts of anger as she glanced at his obviously wet diaper, dirty blue t-shirt and the pacifier clipped by a small peg.

“I didn’t hear you come in, sweetie.” Chloe’s Mother began, hands deep in the dish bowl, busying herself with mac and cheese covered plastic plates and half-empty baby bottles. “Did you have a good day at school?”

“I’m fine, Mom.” Chloe huffed, her lips scrunched together, “Just a boring day.”

“Boring, huh?” Chloe’s Mother replied, “Anything else?

“N-Not really,” She was keen to move the conversation away from school, “Just studying, exams, and— and— loads of other school stuff.”

“Are you sure?”

The rattling of the dishes stopped, and so did the tap, Chloe’s Mother slowly turned — giving her daughter an expression that sent a shiver down her spine. “I received a call from Mrs. Cherry, today.”

Chloe bit her lip, “Mom, I didn’t have an—“

“There’s no need to lie.” Chloe’s Mother began, removing the washing gloves from her hands, she walked over to her daughter and lowered herself. “You had an accident at school, again.”

“I d-didn’t mean to do it.” Chloe’s eyes drifted away from her mother’s gaze, “I had some water, and I didn’t make it to the bathroom in time.”

An invading hand soon crept underneath Chloe’s skirt, lifting up the clothing to fully reveal the diaper, Chloe’s Mother soon pressed her hand against the crotch area and checked for wetness.

“M-Mommy!”

“Just checking, sweetie.” Chloe’s Mother hummed.

“I’m not a baby! I don’t need diaper checks!” Chloe protested, her hands attempted to combat her mother’s, poorly attempting to push away the larger invading hands. The clip for Chloe’s school skirt came off, leaving her daughter in just her t-shirt, socks and diaper in the middle of the kitchen,

“We’re going to have a talk about your ‘whoopsie’ at school a little later. For now, just look after your baby brother in the living room while I clean the mess in the kitchen.” Chloe’s Mother explained, fully removing the skirt and placing it on the worktop. She walked over to Lucas, who had been mindlessly smiling at the appearance of his big sister, and removed him from the highchair.

“I don’t wanna play with my b-baby brother.” Chloe sniffled, “He’s gonna laugh at me for being a big kid who wears diapers!”

“Nonsense.” Chloe’s Mother playfully rolled her eyes, “He’s happy to see you. Go in the living room and make sure he’s playing with his toys. I’ll get some fresh clothes from the laundry room in just a minute.”

With Lucas in Chloe’s arms, she begrudgingly walks into the living room and heads over to her baby brother’s corner — stocked with toys, blankets and all sorts of baby items. She sets Lucas on the floor and watches her baby brother slowly crawl over to his toys, cringing at the sight of his wet diaper.

You’ve seen enough. There’s plenty of potential with Lucas to ‘help’ Chloe see reason with her irrational hatred of diapers and all things considered babyish. You scan Lucas’ small frame, oddly smiling, watching as how his uncoordinated crawl raises his small bottom into the air.
1543311333121.title: Wait and see

15433113331211.content:
You could take the easy way and taker over her body, but right now you like to try something else. You whisper to her mind and fill her heart with envy.
“Look at him, small, stupid, useless and he never helped your mom in the house. But he receives all the attention, because he is still in diapers and needs help himself. Don’t you want to receive more attention by your mom?”
Chloe’s spirit nods and asks you how.
“So simple. Try to be more like him. Get a pacifier and use your diaper like him. In a few minutes he will get a lovely diaper change, while your mom will give you fresh panties and tell you to get changed yourself.”
“But I hate the diapers, I want to get out of them as soon as possible.” Her spirit says and you see her start to play with her brother, like her mother has told her.

Frustrated you shake your head. “Why do I have to do everything myself.” You think by yourself and take over her body. Only for a second, that is all you need.
When Chloe blinks and is back in charge she feels her diaper growing warm and wet.
“Oh NO! Why did that happen?” She whispers and tries to hide it.
But even Lucas notice it, point his finger and giggles.

“What?! You dare? You do it all the time!” Chloe snaps in anger and pull his pacifier out of his mouth. Her surprised brother stares at her with an open mouth and starts to cry.

“Chloe, what is going on? Oh Chloe, give him back his pacifier, you can have your own if you want.” Her mother just enters the room with new clothes for her. She takes the paci from Chloe and give him back to Lucas.
“Really Chloe, you know that he loves his pacifier, he is like you were in his age.”
Then her eyes got stuck at Chloe’s crotch – and a second later she checks her daughters’ diaper.
“Oh Chloe, …”

Her mother…

You’ve been reveling in the sudden chaos. The pandemonium consisting of Chloe wetting her diaper and being sent to her room fed your hunger for misery — and yet, you’re still not satisfied. A few minutes had passed since Chloe eventually stopped sobbing, her body curled into a slight ball, adjusting to the cold, damp diaper between her legs as she waited for her Mother to return.

“It’s not my fault. It’s not my fault.” Chloe mumbled to herself, “I had a few accidents, so what? I shouldn’t be wearing stupid, silly baby diapers anymore.”

The bedroom door eventually opens, allowing Chloe’s Mother with Lucas to enter, holding a small collection of clothes in her spare hand.

“Oh, sweetie,” Chloe’s Mother cooes, “What’s the matter? If you think you’re in trouble because of those accidents then don’t be. You can’t help yourself.”

“Not a baby,” Chloe repeated, “Not a stupid baby.”

“You’re not a stupid baby, honey.” Chloe’s Mother had finally reached her daughter’s bed, lowering Lucas and the fresh collection of clothing beside her. Lucas took his own initiative to clumsily crawl toward his sister, idly patting her shoulder with a grin.

“See?” Chloe’s Mother smiled, her arms encompassed both Lucas and Chloe, bringing them both together for a large cuddle. “We don’t think you’re a stupid baby, right, Lucas?”

While Lucas didn’t respond, the infant soon folded into his mother’s embrace and continued to smile happily. For Chloe, her nerves cooled as she felt her mother’s arms.

“Let’s get you changed,” Chloe’s Mother gently whispered, “I understand you’re upset. Everyone has a bad day, nothing to be ashamed of.”

You’ve seen enough. You begin to notice Chloe’s sudden warmth to her mother’s calming words — which is something you’re not particularly fond of.

You prepare to make a decision,
154331133312113.title: Send her to her room.

You really have enough of this super sweet nonsense and you can’t stand it any longer. Why can’t Chloe’s mother be strict and a bit mean. She gets up and after a minute she comes back with a new pacifier, still sealed in wrapping and takes him out.
By now Lucas – finally – looks upset and tries to get his pacifier back, but you don’t let him until your mom grabs yours and give if back to your baby brother.
“NO!” You shout out and try to get it back. Behaving like this is really funny!
Chloe’s mom push the new pacifier in your mouth and hold it in place.
“No more shouting and no more steeling your brothers. This is yours now, but if you behave like such a baby you will keep it in and be a good girl, understood?”
Obedient you nod your head and suck on the pacifier.

“At least one step further.” You think and watch “your” mom takes the training pants.
“Okay honey, time to get you out of your wet diaper. I brought some trainers since you hated diapers so much – or have you changed your mind about that as well?”

What now? Stay in charge and ask for diapers?

Resist the trainers as well?

15433113331211312.content:
You were, quite frankly, astounded by the sheer patience Chloe’s Mother seemed to possess. Her constant tactical advantage over every situation — the near-perfect control over both Chloe and Lucas deemed this possession to be a slightly tricky one. The decision to allow Chloe to regain control of herself didn’t come lightly, as the time for planning and careful studying of Chloe’s Mother had to initially come first.

Chloe’s Mother had begun removing the sticky tapes from Chloe’s diaper. The process was comfortably silent, even with Lucas watching, the shades of red glowing from Chloe’s cheeks couldn’t get any brighter. She obediently suckled on her newly gifted pacifier and kept quiet, eyes focused on the ceiling above as lukewarm hands worked her clothes.

“What am I going to do, huh?” Chloe’s Mother began, softly cooing as her daughter’s fresh pull-up was slid alongside her legs. “Two accidents in one day. One accident a week was bad enough, but, now I can’t begin to imagine what’s going to happen if this keeps up.”

Chloe felt the need to object. Her pacifier continued to soothe her, and kept her quiet for the moment being despite the embarrassing situation she found herself in.

She finally leaned upright, feeling the sudden cushion between her legs as Chloe rested on the edge of her bed. Her eyes sunk to the floor, still suckling on her pacifier for comfort.

“Is there something on your mind?” Chloe’s Mother asked, curling a finger around the pacifier’s handle. “Is it stress? Is there something going on at school that’s worrying you?”

The pacifier was removed from Chloe’s mouth with an audible pop.

“Because...” Chloe’s Mother continued, “If you’re stressed out because of school, then maybe we can arrange a few days off. I read in a magazine that children sometimes need a small break from school when their stress levels are getting too high.”

The sentiment was shared with Lucas. The infant eventually crawled over, resting between Chloe’s legs and embracing her tummy with a clumsy cuddle — a cuddle which Chloe found comforting all of a sudden.

She took the initiative to retrieve the pacifier from her mother’s hand and place it back inside her mouth.

“I get it.” Chloe’s Mother nodded, “You want some time alone. I’ll be downstairs preparing dinner and then we’ll have a nice, quiet chat about today. Play with Lucas. I know he’s a baby but he’s your little brother. He’s just curious.”

You were dealing with an opponent of great strength. It seemed Chloe’s Mother knew Chloe better than she knew herself — and that wasn’t tolerable in the slightest. But internally, Chloe was immensely conflicted with her sudden outbreak of accidents. The spare pacifier seemed to be the tip of the iceberg, infact.

There wasn’t much in terms of opportunity to consume more of Chloe’s negative energies, yet. She idly interacted with her baby brother, handling him and giving her own comforting hugs to Lucas.

You decide to wait things out. Chloe wasn’t going anywhere, and perhaps, the interaction between her and Lucas might lead to more shenanigans.

After dinner,...

1543311333121131211.content:
The lights were dimmed a touch — making the atmosphere comfortable and cosy for both Chloe and a tired Lucas, letting them rest themselves on the couch with a small bowl of ice cream for dessert. Chloe’s Mother had taken the liberty of pulling the curtains to and dialed back the volume on the TV to grab her daughter’s attention. Lucas had resigned to making himself comfortable with a nearby pillow.

She smiled, “Let’s talk about today, honey bunny.”

A pit soon developed in her tummy. The taste for the sweet vanilla ice cream had suddenly turned sour as the inevitable subject came up. She tensed her legs, silently cursing at the rustling of the pull-ups around her waist.

“I don’t wanna talk about it.” Chloe finished by resting her spoon back inside the bowl. She ignored her mother’s presence and attempted to continue focusing on the TV in front — but found cocentrating difficult as Claire’s soft gaze forced her to eventually brake from watching her cartoons.

“We’ve got to talk about something,” Claire replied, she slipped between Chloe and Lucas, opting to lift a tiring Lucas and rest his head against her chest. “Can’t bottle up how you feel. You’ve gotta talk to me or else I won’t understand how you’re feeling.”

“Got nothing to say,” Chloe mumbled, she idly dabbed her spoon into the remaining ice cream. “No one’s gonna understand. Mrs. Cherry doesn’t understand. You don’t understand.”

“Don’t understand what, honey?” Clair inched closer to her daughter, “If you’re having a hard time at school then we can—“

“No,” Chloe huffed, “Big girls don’t have accidents at school. Everybody says I’m a big girl but I can’t stop having accidents all the time. It’s so hard. Babies have accidents, not big girls.”

Tears begun to form, prompting Claire to wrap an arm around her for comfort and hush her. “You’re having a bad day, sweetie. It’s tough, I know. I know. A weak bladder means there’s more of a chance you’ll have an accident. You’re trying so hard to stay dry.”

“I w-was thirsty in school.” Chloe sniffled, “I had my water b-bottle and I drank too much. I t-thought I was good because I didn’t have any accidents for a week and then... and t-then...”

“You have two accidents,” Claire hummed, “You’ve had a little setback. I’d be angry at myself, too.”

“You would?” Chloe looked up.

“I would,” Claire smiled, “I’d be frustrated if I worked so hard to last a week without a single accident. And then — boop.” She playfully booped her daughter’s nose, making a smile appear across Chloe’s lips.

You're surprised, watching Chloe's Mother perfectly turn around the situation was mind-boggling, to say the least. You expected Chloe to flip her lid, break down into tears and throw a tantrum the likes were never seen before -- given her strong distaste of diapers and everything considered babyish. You're seriously starting to question whether there's another supernatural agent working against you. There's no way Chloe's Mother is THAT good.

"...What should I do?" Chloe found herself glancing at her pull-up.

"Let's keep working at it," Claire responded, smiling, "Rules are rules. You have to stay in pull-ups since you've had an accident, but that doens't mean we can figure out ways to prevent more accidents in the future."

The news was slightly mixed for Chloe. She felt her cheeks redden, suddenly remembering the pacifier handed to her, and awkwardly shuffled the silicone nipple away from her.

"You can keep it, silly." A hand went over the pacifier, allowing Claire to pick it up and hand it back to her daughter. "Mrs. Cherry told me about that little tantrum you had in the office."

A sinking feeling soon developed in Chloe's stomach, "B-But, I'm not a baby, and... And... Big girls don't use--"

"I know, I know," Claire playfully rolled her eyes, "Here's the deal. If you feel fustrated, at all, then use your pacifier to feel calm. You were a lot calmer when you had that pacifier in your mouth -- so keep it. I'll keep put it in your bedroom and whenever you feel fustrated about anything, then use it."

Chloe winced, "Does that mean I'm not in trouble for having a tantrum at school?"

"Not on your life," Claire smiled, winking. "No ice cream and bedtime's a little earlier for the rest of the week."

You're onto something, big. Chloe's Mother had just made a fatal mistake in allowing Chloe to keep her pacifier with her, as it goes, to relieve her stress or fustration. If you manage to get Chloe to accept her new pacifier and use it whenever possible, that'll maximize her negative energies for sure. Perhaps even making her take the pacifier in public spaces, or better, school. Her distaste of all things babyish will fuel her misery, and having to use a pacifier to calm herself down from her continued series of accidents seemed like a good idea.

15433113331211312113.content:
The day ended very peacefully, with the promised earlier bedtime for Chloe. The pacifier is laying on the nightstand as well – as promised by Claire.
After the exhausting day Chloe should be able to fall asleep quickly, but she is not. She is tossing and turning in der pajamas and stare are the illuminated clock from times to times.

Making somebody restless is the first thing a demon learns and with a child it is a piece of cake. You just keep fueling her distress until Chloe decides to try out the pacifier to calm down. Right away you stop your demonic abilities and she feels better.

Mistaken the comfort to come from her babyish dummy, Chloe feels shame, but keeps the rubber-devise in her mouth until she falls asleep.

You grin at yourself and feel pleased. “Such a sweet misery.” You smile and rest for a few hours as well.


When the morning comes, Chloe begins to get restless and almost wakes up. Her bladder is begging for relieve after the long time in bed and she almost wakes up, when you decide to make her dream a bit more… .
In her sleep, Chloe is an easy victim to your power. Instead of waking up for real, she only dreams that she is waking up. But you let her think she is in Lucas’ crib, surrounded by bars and unable to climb out.
“Why am I here?” She is whining. Looking down she sees herself in a thick diaper.
“Mommy!” She calls out, but nobody is coming. Helpless, she feels the pressure in her bladder grow, until it is too late and she floods her thick diaper.”
“Oh no… . “ She whimpers and put her pacifier back into her mouth, to find comfort.


“Time to wake up, big girl.”
Claire is softly rocking her daughter’s shoulder.

“Huu?” Chloe wonders, turning over and look at her mother’s surprised face.

“Oh, so you had the pacifier in all night long?” Claire asks, but quickly shakes that thought off.
“Anyway, that does not matter, you are still my big girl.” She smiles. “Come one, time to get ready for school.”

Chloe quickly takes the pacifier out and sits up in bed. She feels the wetness between her legs and freeze. “Oh no!” She whines.

Claire is already at her dresser and takes out the school uniform and a fresh set of underwear, when she hears her daughter whimper. “What is it?... Oh… again?” She comes to her daughter and slowly pulls the blanket away, then she helps her daughter to her feet and pulls down her pajama-pants, showing off training pants, without a single star, without a princess – completely soaked.

“I am sorry mommy.” Chloe whimpers and hides her face behind her hands.
“I dreamed I was in… I dreamed I was trapped and had to pee in my diaper. I.. I mean… my trainers… .” She blushed more and starts to sob, but Claire had heard the word clearly. Still the woman hugs her daughter and comforts her. “It is okay baby, nightmares happen and your trainers where able to hold it.” She says in a loving way, ignoring the little wet spot on the pj-pants.

She really wants to help her daughter and doing so, she quickly replace the fresh panties with fresh trainers. It would be better for Chloe if she has an accident in trainers, than in her pants.

Cloe accepts the trainers, after some encouraging words and finally went to school in them.
“I put a spare in your backpack, together with your little comforter.” Claire smiles and sends her daughter off.

“So, another day in school.” You grin by yourself. “And trainers and pacifier are on hand. Let’s see if I can make her use one – or both.”…

In school Chloe…

154331133312113121131.content:
You're waiting, curiously, letting Chloe take the reins of her body and adapt to school life while wearing her training pants. Her otherwise chipper demeanor seemed to have disappeared, leaving her to obviously take smaller steps to reduce the crinkling with an occasional tug on her t-shirt to prevent the top of her pull-ups from being seen by prying eyes. Her backpack was tightened -- possibly thanks to Claire's excessive doting, which prevented someone from grabbing it to see what's inside.

The first class was Art. Chloe had sat herself amongst two other students her age, that being Maisey and Jakob, two of her close friends. It seemed Chloe had a knack for sitting the furthest away from the rest of her class, as did her friends, upon suddenly noticing the space between the rest of the class.

If the occasional rude glances and hushed snickering were anything to go by — it seemed Chloe and her friends weren’t the most popular students in the class.

“You’re overreacting.” Jakob emitted a huff, he brushed his short brown hair toward the side of his head. “I did NOT drop paint on your side of the table!”

Maisey adjusted her glasses, “You clearly did! You splashed paint on my side of the table on purpose.”

The bickering between friends caused Chloe to chuckle, briefly pausing the argument between Jakob and Maisey, while Maisey opted to glare at her laughing friend — it was Jakob who shrugged off the argument and went back to painting, soon lost in his thoughts as he returned to his painting.

You’re scanning, expertly analysing, Chloe’s two friends and wondering the possibilities of making things worse. Your analysis of Chloe's friends seemed to lay out their personalities instantly -- with Jakob being a little slow and carefree, and Maisey being nerdy and seemingly unable to keep her cool in situations most wouldn't bat an eye toward.

Maisey continued to huff, giving a pleading look toward Chloe, "Chloe! Tell him!"

"Tell him what?" Chloe giggled, "He's just painting."

"He's not! He's trying to ruin my work if he keeps splashing paint everywhere!"

Despite this, Jakob seemed lost in his thoughts, happily applying excessive amounts of paint onto his work sheet.

"You take his side all the time!" Maisey frowned, "He doesn't splash paint on your side because he LIKES you."

"I do not," Jakob finally replied, "I don't like girls."

"We're girls, silly!" Chloe continued to giggled.

"You're not girls," Jakob blinked, "You're my friends."

"Friends who happen to be girls." Maisey rolled her eyes.

"That too." Jakob nodded.

The conversation felt awkward for you. The discovery of the underlying crush between Jakob and Chloe seemed brittle at best, they're too young, and anything beyond that is them being children. You're bored; but you decide to make something happen for the sake of time as it appeared class was almost over.

154331133312113121131211.content:
The following lunch break was eeirly silent for Chloe, Jakob and Maisey. The rumours, childish giggling and teasing couldn't go unheard for as long as they sat in the lunch hall. For Chloe, her head drooped and her gaze fell to the floor in sheer shame alone -- leaving her friends to awkwardly share their own concerned glances directed at their friend. While the pacifier Chloe had sported earlier was stuffed inside her backpack; the familiar urge to pull it out and reduce her high levels of stress was returning.

"Gee," Jakob cleared his throat, finding the sudden courage to speak, "I didn't know you could bring pacifiers into school like that."

A sharp nudge from Maisey's elbow into her friend's stomach forced Jakob to grunt in pain; prompting him to worryingly glance at Maisey before resigning the idea of speaking.

Maisey adjusted her glasses, "We're not going to tease you, Chloe."

"No, no." Jakob shook his head, "We've all brought weird stuff into school before. See, there's this one time I brought in a--"

"You don't understand." Chloe grimaced, "I was having a bad day yesterday and my Mommy thought it was a good idea I take one of my baby brother's pacifiers to keep me calm."

"Why use it in the middle of class?" Jakob asked. "I'd hide under the table or go into the bathroom."

"Jakob! That's-- That's a good question." Maisey nodded.

"I felt really stressed all of a sudden. I can't help it." The explanation from Chloe didn't solve any issues Jakob and Maisey seemed to have. Their friend was horribly upset and comfort could go a long way. The background teasing and snickering from the rest of the kids in the lunch hall wasn't doing them any favours. Maisey frowned, and decided somewhere else was probably for the best.

"Let's go," Maisey huffed, "Those dumb kids over are gonna tease you. Let's go somewhere where they can't do that." She retrieved her packed lunch and backpack, soon taking Chloe's hand and directing her to the lunch hall's entrance.

“Why, Maisey? Jakob? What brings you here?”

“Oh, Miss Cherry,” Maisey began, “We have a— er, we have a problem. It’s Chloe.”

“I d-don’t know!” Chloe wept; she couldn’t hold her tears and proceeded to bawl in front of her friends. She brought her hands over to her eyes and poorly wiped away her tears. “I’m having a bad d-day! I d-don’t know what to do!”

“You poor thing.” Mrs. Cherry lowered herself to Chloe’s height, quickly wrapped her arms around the distressed child and pulling her into a soft cuddle. A few cooes and light hushes did nothing to stop Chloe’s emotional state. “There, there.”

—

You’re curious; if allowing this scene to play out without your supernatural aid will make things sway in your favour — or perhaps taking control of Chloe would make things better.

info.brief_description: A world where you are in diapers.
info.description:
No excessive swearing. Every entry must be atleast a paragraph in length. If I see any chapter shorter than 4 sentences it will be deleted! The SOLE exception to this is if it's an option chapter like "Which option did you choose a or B/ where did you go, the mall or home". Sex is NOT allowed, you can imply that it happened, I (and I'm sure others) don't want to read any sex scenes. Also kissing and stuff is fine. By the way please don't give too many one option chapters, it's annoying. Once in awhile is no big deal, just don't make a habit of it. Other than that, do whatever you want!

For the most part, just try to keep it PG-13 at its worst.
